name: Bushcamp Field
description: Bushcamp in a field. Also when raining this place is not muddy. No facilities

name: Basic but good Hotel
description: Basic but good hotel, when you stay there they do the registration. Price 3000 Roebel per night. Wifi on the room and breakfast included.

name: Bushcamp Field
description: Bushcamp on a field nearby a river (not for washing). Old long drop toilet nearby. Nice place, great views, fishing spot, many mosquitos

name: Bushcamp Field
description: Bushcamp on a stoney field next to a dry river bed. Quiet, safe, nice views, no facilities. We saw a desertfox here.

name: Bushcamp Hills
description: Bushcamp in the hills, out of sight. Nice quiet spot. Nice view, no facilities

name: Aktash
description: Fuel, accept Visa card. Advised against using small stations like this.

name: P256
description:
Fuel, no Visa card
The A3C has Visa ! And we could FULL up.

name: Shopping Mall
description: Shopping Mall near Lenin Square in Rubtsovsk

name: Border Post
description: Russian side of the Border between Russia and Mongolia

name: Travel Agency
description: Travel agency that can organise Altai registration. House numer 68, office 232

name: Workshop
description: Greasing axels

name: Supermarket
description: Good supermarket, accept Visa card in Kosh-Agach

name: Souzdal Camping
description: A great campsite. probably the most 'western' campsite we have have found so far in Russia. Amazing showers.

name: Gallery & More Hostel
description:
Clean, freshly renovated hostel. Twin room for 2 people 1550 rubles or $24 usd per night. free unsecured parking right at the entrance. Might be able to fit some larger vans and campers but not truly big rigs.

nomadicyear.com

name: Sata25 Toyota Car parts
description: A small warehouse for toyota replacement parts. Brake pads, engine parts, hoses, filters, etc.

name: Tech Progress Service (–¢–µ—Ö–ü—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–µ—Å—Å–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å)
description:
General mechanic, wheel alignment, oil change, brake pads and rotor work. 
Nice guys, familiar with most 4x4, especially Japanese and Korean cars

name: Magistral cafe and gas station
description: Cafe, gas station and tire fixing place if you need. You can stay here over night without a problem.

name: Motel Cafe
description:
Large parking in front of a Cafe and Hotel. Truckers overnight stop. has showers in a smaller building on the left. 120 roubles/20 minutes. 
Right next to the road.

name: Pizza-Mania
description: Fast food joint with the regular fare of American food, taste okay nothing special. Has free Wi-Fi without a password. Can park nearby and use it.

name: Erofey Palich
description: Overnight trucker rest stop. Has laundry for 150 rubles per load and shower for 200 rubles for 20 minutes. Sell water for 2 rubles/liter. There is a covered patio area to get away from the rain or sun.

name: GBM Logistic
description:
Russian customs broker. It cost 8000 rubles to get the car out of port in Vladivostok. The deal with ferry and container shipping. 
gbmsun2@gmail.com and gbmsun1@mail.ru

They speak English fluently. It took us 2 days to get the car out. 
Read more on our blog: nomadicyear.com

name: Green hotel
description: We arrived here unannounced at 10pm and stumbled across probably the only fluent English speaker for miles around! Anastasia is the daughter of the owners. She went out of her way to find an affordable room (2500 rubles) and included breakfast. She is very interested in Europe especially England and asked all about our trip.

name: Cafe AZS
description: Large dirt parking lot next to a cafe and gas station. Truckers sleep here all the time. Safe.

name: Hostel Izba (very good and cheap)
description:
Very nice little hostel in a traditional wooden house.
Owner Alex is super nice and speaks very good english.
There are 2 dorms with seven beds and 2 rooms with 2 beds.
A kitchen and a bathroom are available.
The place is very clean. We were able to park our car and motorcycles in the backyard away from the street. 
1 night costed us 350 roubles per head

name: Just Over Western Mongolian Border
description: Less than 1km on left after Russian border control in Tashanta.  Next to green shipping container

name: Hotel Inturist Irkutsk
description: You can park behind the hotel for a night and sleep in your car. 600 rubles for 24 hours.

name: Cake and Coffee Union
description:
Clean coffee shop with decent wifi and great coffee. The staff loves overlanders here. 

nomadicyear.com

name: Banya (Russian Public Sauna)
description: 150 roubles per person for 1 hour. Hot steam room, hot water to take a shower. closed on monday, Wednesday and Friday.

name: Pervaya Expediciya
description: Campground with bathrooms, fresh water and showers. you can camp or rent a little cabin. showers after 7 pm for 100 rubles. camping 250 rubles per person per night. open for summer only June 14th to September 14.

name: Free Public Water Tap
description: Large blue water tap for free clean drinking water.

name: Consulate General of South Korea
description: Located on the 3rd floor of Hotel Inturist

name: General Consulate of Mongolia
description: Monday - Friday. 9am-1pm. overnight visa processing.

name: Consulate General of Mongolia
description: Visa processing. Use side entrance on left side of building. Good English spoken. Friendly.

name: The Best Hostel Irkutsk
description: Clean, quiet. Parking in the back unsecured. 600 rubles per person per night. laundry 100 rubles per load.

name: Kluevka Cafe
description: Cafe with a large gravel parking lot for truckers to sleep. there is a small dirt road just to the right of the building that  leads to shore of Baikal.

name: Wild Camp
description: On a track to a farm, quiet location. No water no facilities.

name: Wild Camp By The River In The Altai
description: Wild camping next to the river in the Altai region. River water available. Other side of the river from the road so undisturbed evening.

name: Turbaza Baikal
description: A few cabins for rent, parking lot for all kinds of rigs, pit toilet and shower. 100 rubles a night.

name: Kotelok Cafe and Restaurant
description: Downstairs. Food, coffee and free wifi.

name: Clearing Near River
description: 100m from road.  River drowns out traffic noise.  Nice and sunny, flat spot

name: Wild Camping Near SPB
description: Lake close to the main road from Estonia to St. Petersburg. Nice little lake for fishing. We made a campfire and camped on the grassy area. No facilities but lots of mosquitos. A bit noisy from the street but not too bad.

name: Potable water
description:
10-50 liters: 5 rubles
50-100 liters: 10 rubles
100-200 liters: 20 rubles
200-500 liters: 30 rubles
500-1000 liters: 50 rubles
put the money in the bowl on the post.

nomadicyear.com

name: Moto MNP (motorcycle parts)
description: shop with spares for motorcycles. tires, batteries, lights, helmets...

name: Sokolniki
description:
Nice campground in a National Park, close to metro station and near supermarket.
The cooking facilities is behind the toilets to the right from the entrance.

 Save place to stay for a visit of Moskow. It was about 20‚Ç¨/night, wifi was not working, but the hot showers were good, laundry available and the city center is easy reachable with the bus + metro.

name: Diesel and Gas Mechanic
description: Very good mechanic for diesel and gas engine. Dmitriy is the owner he is a German guy and speaks little English. The mechanic speaks little english too.

name: Kosh-Agach Hostel
description:
Parking inside a hostel with good protection from the wind. 500 rubles for parking and sleeping in your car for 2 people, includes hot shower and fast wifi.

nomadicyear.com

name: Oblepiha cafe and truck stop
description: Everything is nice except the mosquitos.

name: Safari Irkutsk
description:
Good guys. English is spoken a bit.
Helpful and resourceful. Helped me find new parts.
4x4 experts

name: place near an one way street
description: no faccilities , place to stay

name: Mechanic U Mamonta (CTO)
description: Oil, filter, fuel filter, air filter change. Suspension inspection. Wheel alignment.

name: Mechanic "Bashnya" (–°–¢–û –ë–∞—à–Ω—è)
description:
These mechanics can do it all, small or large vehicles. fast work, good prices. a day of work costs 10,000 rubles.
I replaced ball bearings, all the rubber parts of suspension here. plus refurbished my leaking steering rack.

name: Avantage Car Parts Store (–ê–≤–∞–Ω—Ç–∞–∂)
description: Great store for most Japanese and Korean vehicles.

name: ABTO–°–ï–†–í–ò–°
description:
These guys helped fixing a leak in my rusty tank. Better fix than on the road side from Perm to Kazan.

They are in the back of the building you see from the road

name: Mobile center Toyota service
description:
Good and knowledgeable

Open every day from 10:00 to 20:00 even on sundays

name: Wild Camp
description: Water source, seems special to locals.  Very peaceful, few mozzies but lovely view over fields

name: Wild Camp Next To Lake Kolyvanskoye
description:
Beautiful spot on the lake.  Other campers nearby.  Some mozzies.  Campfires ok.
Good megafon 3G signal

name: Gas
description: Easy refilling of gas bottles

name: City Park
description: For free. Middle of the city.

name: North Hotel
description: We washed our laundry here. We paid 500 R for two bags but prices may change.

name: GPS
description: Easy bottle refill

name: Kafe
description: Secure parking. 100 Rubles per night. With restaurant, shop and mechanic.

name: Behind Mc Donalds
description: For free. Good parking.

name: Motel Camping
description: Great Campsite & Motel next to a Park. Good washing machine, clean toilets & shower. Good parking for big Caravans. barbecue place. friendly people.

name: Bushcamp Lake
description: Near to the main road to Caspian sea there's a muddy road leading to a lake. Quiet, peaceful, lots of space on the fields around it.

name: River Bushcamp near Cottages
description: Wild Camp at a side river of Wolga. Nearby there are cottages for rent. boats are available, too. Big rigs are welcome to park wherever they want. Lots of Picknick space along the river. Good for relaxing and fishing.

name: Camping & Cottages
description: Friendly fishermans place with enough space for big rigs and nice cottages with bed & clean bathroom. Good river view & fishing spot. You can also rent a boat here. Pleasant place in spring and summer time.

name: Bridge Crossing
description:
This bridge is just available if your car is below 4,5 tons. Rigs heavier than 4,5 tons have to go via Wolgograd to Kasachstan.

You can take a ferry if your truck is bigger.

name: Wildcamp Wolga
description: Wildcamp at river. Near Highway. Good hidden spot for spending a night and take a rest. Nice view.

name: Bushcamp field
description: Wildcamp at field. Muddy streets lead to a village near the river. On the way to it there's plenty of space for big rigs.

name: Ukraine - Russian Border
description: Ukraine to Russia. Took 1.5 hours. 5 minutes checking the Camper inside. VERY polite and friendly Russian officers. Russian VISA obligatory! No Problem at all. Lot of paperwork. Car insurance  was not checked at all.

name: Littel Lake
description: Place at a nice lake. Little noisy because of the road.

name: AutoShina
description: Great Mechaniks. One is speaking perfectly English! Open even  on Sunday! Repaired our Generator in 4 Hours. Toilette  and cafeteria and fast Internet.

name: At the old road
description: From the main road drive 500m on the old road  (not on the GPS ). Then you can hide down at the field behind some trees.

name: Hide out at a field
description: Next to the train rail at one of these entries to a field.

name: Parking at the highest Statue of Europe
description:
Parking at the highest Statue of Europe. Good for one night. Lots of couples, but from 23:30 absolutely quiet. It seemed to been save: absolutely no vandalism around here, no freaks and no one drunken (it was on a Tuesday).
You have to visit the monuments in the dark!

name: Dadscha Camping
description: They have dadschas but let us camp on the parking. Nice park with trees and quiet. 50 m to the Wolga beach.

name: Tourist Information
description: Gagarin Street 12. Open from 8:30 until 17:00 the whole week. See photos. Very friendly.

name: Planetarium
description: Planetary from 1954. A present from DDR to Russia. Carl Zeiss projector. Nice show.

name: Wild camping in birch forest at lake
description:
Don't forget, this place is only 15 km away from Majak, where there has been a huge radioactive catastrophe even worse than Tschernobyl. The last radioactive accident is reported to have occurred in 2017. 

The water and environment is probably highly decontaminated with radioactive material. Don't swim or get in contact with the water.

Follow the path from the main road which you can see in maps.me. There is a motocross track mark on the road but nobody around. Beautiful birch forest. Nice views to the lake. Perfect sun in the morning. Very quiet. Good Beeline signal.

name: Bush camping next to small village road
description: Aprox 3km from big highway. Covered from village road by birch trees. Good enough for short night.

name: Hide out at the Wolga beach
description: Hide out at the Wolga beach. you can drive 100m further than the Parking and stay at the beach. Muddy if it is raining. good for a night.

name: —Ñ—Ä–µ–≥–∞—Ç (Fregatte)
description: Nice Area. They have rooms with showers from 3000 rus. You can rent a boat for fishing (3500 RUS). We filled our watertank - seams from the river and is the same for the showers. Second night they allowed us spending in the camper on the Parking for free. Ivan is speaking English.

name: Parking Lot
description:
A private guarded parking lot for cars. They let us sleep the night in the camper. You have to come early in the morning or after 4pm, because at 13:00 the place is full of cars. Very friendly guard.
 Visit the Gagarin Museum in the same Street!

name: In the Wood
description: Little Spot at the road next to a Datscha-Base. Nobody here.

name: Parking at the Military Museum
description: Big Parking Lot. One can here the highway 200m away, but not too noisy. If the museum is open: cafeteria and restroom available.

name: Military Museum
description: Wide area with a lot of military stuff. Guided tour through the submarine. one may drive in a little tank. Open every day, see photo.

name: Lada Museum
description: 2 Rooms, all models of Lada and some other stuff. One or two hours to look. Closed on Sunday and Monday.

name: Guarded Parking
description: Guarded Parking next to the beautiful river. 500 a night. Some couples with car making a walk in the evening. Many Moskitos around here üòâ

name: Memorial for the dead of 4. June 1989
description: Memorial for the dead of 4. June 1989. Catastrophic gas explosion killed over 500 people, mostly children. Absolutely unbelievable story.

name: Parking at Memorial
description: Large parking aera about 700m from the memorial and the railroad. Except from the train it's pure nature. Nobody here.

name: Bushcamp in a little wood
description: Bushcamp in a little wood. Seems to be a dead end Road.  Absolutely Nobody here. Follow the track about 200m. Then there is place to turn around and to stay next to the "highway".

name: Parking in front of the police
description: Parking in front of the police. Not too much traffic, no trucks in this city allowed. Better then at the highway.

name: Bushcamp behind the cementary
description: Bushcamp behind the cementary. One can here the main road,  but not too loud.

name: Astrakhan border Russia - Kazakhstan
description:
Easy border crossing. All done within one hour (arriving at 5:30pm)
Exiting Russia was only a stamp in the passport. 
Entering Kazakhstan was also just a stamp in the passport. The Russian customs document for the car is also valid in Kazakhstan. We didn't have to pay anything on either side. The Kazakhstan insurance is just outside the border, see map for details. 
The road is really bad (pothole in the tarmac) for the first 40km in Kazakhstan (average speed 30kmh).

name: Bush Camp
description: Bushcamp near a minor road. Very little traffic.  One can hide behind the trees. Good for a night. Many Moskitos.

name: Guarded Parking
description: Guarded Parking. Some little busses and some trucks. Not too noisy. Good for a quick night. 24 hours shopping mall near by.

name: Old gravel pit
description: Old gravel pit. Good for a quick night. No traffic.

name: On the old Road.
description: 40 meters near the main road. Little traffic, little noisy. Good for one night.

name: Bushcamp
description: Bushcamp hidden behind some trees. Little  noisy because of the road and train. No bear seen. Good for a night.

name: Bushcamp
description: Bushcamp about 400 meters from the little road. Hidden from the little road. Entrence to the dirt road  at the busstation. In the village (–°–∞–≤–≤–∞—Ç–µ–µ–≤–∫) –∞t the dead end of the little road one can get free water from a public hydrant. Internet by MTC cell phone is fast (H+) at this place.

name: Information support & Assistance
description: Information support & Assistance for Tourists. I speak German and Russian. WhatsApp Number: +79069650936

name: –†–µ–°—Ç–æ (Resto) Dental Clinic in Izhesk
description:
adress: Udmurtskaya street 304, tel: 8 (3412) 908400, email: restoudm@mail.ru
Dental clinic with very modern equipment. 3D scans, 3D printing of inlays, etc.  we had an english speaking dentist. they helpt us rightaway with a broken tooth, but where able to save it with an inlay.

name: Parking of Zagorodnaya hotel near Krasnoyarsk
description: Quite place, they charge 1000 ruble for banya and swimmingpool. the rest is free.

name: At the Baikalbeach
description: Directly at the Sandbach. Wide area. Little crowded with locals from the town, but at night nobody was here. Sandroad from the village but no 4x4 needed. Fast Internet (UMTS) via MTC-CELLPHONE.

name: At the Lakeside
description: Beautiful place directly at the Lakeside. One can here the street but not too loud. Nobody was here but there are several fireplaces. Sensitive area: protect nature!

name: Center of Budism
description: Large area with many temples. Great site! Take a English speaking guide. Learned a lot about budisme.

name: 360 Degree Panorama Bar
description: At the top of the Hotel: "Bar 12". One has a great view over the whole city. At the hotel reception one can book a 4 hours trip to the Temples of Iwolginsk - 5000 Rubels with a English speaking Guide including transfer - Great excursion! Ask for Danica K.

name: Giant Excravator
description: Giant Carbon Excravator. 6 kilometers dirty road. Really a monster!

name: Bushcamp
description: Bushcamp near the Giant Excravator. There are several little lakes here or you hide behind the excravator. Little busy at the Lakeside with local people from the town. Absolutely silent! No 4x4 needed except if it is raining.

name: Little lake
description: One can hide behind the lake. The difficult part is to leave the main road,  there are several junctions, look for the best not to damage the car. Little noisy because of the main road.  Some locals bathing. Good for one  night.

name: Krasnoschekovo
description: Nice bushcampspot next to the river. There are several tracks to several spots. Beeline coverage.

name: Buchta Krestowaja - –ë–ê–ó–ê –û–¢–î–´–•–ê
description: Camp with rooms for rent and camping . View on Baikal lake. 300Rb for camper or car+tent and 2 pax. From Petrova it is 15 km dirt road. Follow the signs Buchta Krestowaya and later the –ë–ê–ó–ê signs. In summer be extremly careful with fire. Few times a day they run the genarator. No Internet or GSM signal here.

name: Glas-Repair Windscreen
description: Here one can repair little holes in the windscreen. Lots of other mechanics around.

name: Vw center Novosibirsk
description: Vw center with good workshop. Little english is spoken. Coffee, drinks, WiFi and toilet available.

name: Olgino motel
description:
Combined motel and campground. Camping reception is at the hotel lobby.
2017 the did not accept credit card.
The receptionist I met spoke some English and perfect German.

To get to the camping ground after registering, turn right when you get out of the door. After about 100 meters turn right a just go down the road and you'll find the camping ground.

name: "No name"
description: A place to turn of the road. The ground seams solid, but if you enter with a big rig proceed with caution. A small rig can be fitted further on the track just behind the sign if you want to get out of view.

name: "No name"
description: Meadow suitable for all kind of camping/rigs. Possible to get out of view from the road. There's a river down to the right among the trees when you enter the area.

name: Tula Necropolis / –¢—É–ª—å—Å–∫–∏–π –ù–µ–∫—Ä–æ–ø–æ–ª—å
description:
Huge, gorgeously creepy graveyard, with hundreds of telegenic tombstones slowly being devoured by the forest. Free to enter.
According to Lonely Planets guidebook: "The graveyard was set up in the 1700s for plague victims. There are also statues and sarcophagic honouring old Tula's wealthy elite, fallen Soviet soldiers and local heros."

name: Ni≈ænee Romanovo
description:
Just a minor trail off the road. Goes for a couple of hundred meters and can with a small rig probably be exited in the other end. Ground is leaning some of the part I've seen, so big tents and rigs might have difficulties finding I suitable spot.

River nearby to the SW.

name: –õ–∞–º–ø–∞–¥–æ–∫
description: Great pizzas, pasta and other food. Entrance around the right corner of the building.

name: Burger Club
description: A regular burger place. Canadian? The at least have the Canadian leaf as logo. Clean and fast, ATM and supermarket close by.

name: Froggy and Duckys clearing
description:
A clearing amongst the trees that can hold a couple of small rigs. Turn of the track towards the NW where the marker is. Go about 25 meters down the track. Turn left in amongs the trees before the clearing. Make camp some where between the turn and about 45 meters in. You will not be 100% out of vision but between 50-90% depending on how low profile you're able to keep. There do come traffic in between at the track.

I fund this track from about 300 meter S or SSW, from the dirt road by the river.

name: Pitejnyj dom kupca Andreeva
description:
Pub with great Russian and "Soviet" food. Cosy interior and they got menus in English.
Half staircase down, partly in the basement.
$$ (of $$$)

name: Eastern riverbank at Novoselka Nerl'ska√¢
description:
Beautiful place with a view over the river and the fields. (Despite the garbage.) There's a path down to the river 30 meter below.

Plenty of spots for camping along the tracks around the marker.

name: Kvasna√¢ Izba
description:
Cosy restaurant in the calm side of the river, just next to a beautiful church. View of the Suzdal'skij kreml'. Try out their homemade "kvass" drink. (They say it should be okay to drive afterwards.)

Menu in combined English and Russian if you ask for it.

name: NE Maksimka
description: A place to get of the main road and spend the night. Quite close to the road, so expect to hear the traffic. There might also pass some locals at the track.

name: A-119, 20 km N of Lipin Bor
description:
Place where a couple of small rigs or one big can make camp. Big rigs can turn around about 50 or 100 meter further down the track.

Expect armies of mosquitoes since there is swamps, water holes and ponds all around.

Backtrack about 50 meters and you'll find a small stream of water. (At least in the rainy season.)

If you are in for some serous wading just continue SE on the gravel track and the track goes into a small lake. I judge at least one meter deep and maybe 30 meters length. The track then continues with gravel surface on the other side.

name: Depo / –î–µ–ø–æ
description: 92, 95 and diesel. There is a button on the left of the pump that you shall press to start it up.

name: Road Karhum√§ki - Suurlahti (peer for Kizhi)
description: Dirt trail that leads in to the woods. Starts straight west of the marker. Got a spot for some small rigs or one big where the marker is. (Big rig: If you can get off the tarmac and on to the trail, you'll make it all the way.)

name: N of airport at Petrozavodsk
description:
A place to turn of the road. Enough space for a couple of small rigs or about 2-3 big rigs.

There is a stream with water 75 meters further down the trail.

name: Laundry place - npeMu M
description:
Fixes your laundry. They might not have time instantly. First they wanted me to wait 5 days. But after some "talking" I hade my things done the same day. At the year of 2017 I paid 1000 rubel for a plastic bag full of clothes. Maybe I paid a little extra for the instant service.

Open mon-fri 09:00-19:00, sat-sun 09:30-18:00.

name: N side of river ≈†otkusa
description:
Plenty of room for all kind of camping. Big rig, small rig, ground tent in any shape and so on.

You find this place by turning off the gravel road seen 375 meters north of the marker.

name: NV of Orzhitsy
description:
Place suitable for a couple of small or big rigs. Not the most beautiful place on earth but it works.

There are a couple of dirt tracks from different directions going here. I used the one coming from SW without any problems.

There are two ponds at site with some muddy water.

No mosquitoes!!

name: Lake Loveckoe ozero
description:
Nice place for as many as you might be. There are multiple other spots as well in the area. Tiny, tiny "beach". üò¨ Haven't tried out the fishing or swimming, but he place looks fine for that.

Keep to the tracks, there are signs showing what I think means no off-roading.

name: Clav√¢nska√¢ trapeza
description:
Cosy place with excellent food. Down in the basement. Very welcoming interior that gives you a feeling of being transferred back to the medieval. 

Su-Th 12-24
Fr-Sa 12-02

Menu also has English text.

name: ƒåajka trenches
description:
Ample of space for big or small rigs all depending on how invisible you wish to be from the gravel road.

(Watch out for iron pegs in the cliff.)

name: Wild Camp - Flower Field
description: beautiful and quite place overlooking flower field. could be hard to reach with big car. "road" could be tricky if wet.

name: Bushcamp
description: Bushcamp at a minor road. One can hide behind some trees on the begin of a mudroad. Many Moskitos.

name: Behind the Wood.
description: From the minor road follow the mudroad direction West. After 300m turn right and hide behind the Wood at the field. Nobody  here and absolutely silent. Slow Internet by MTC cellphone.

name: Bushcamp
description: Follow the mudroad from the minor road about 1000 meters. Then you can hide behind some trees. 4x4 needed if it is raining. Absolutely silent, nobody here.

name: Mega shoppingmall
description: Large auchan supermarket with lots of other shops and foodcourt.

name: Aktru Research Station
description: At the Base of Aktru glacier with enough spaces for tents. Small Internet Cafe and few guest houses with showers and outhouse. only accessible with 4WD or by foot. Great Base to start hiking tours.

name: Bushcamping beyond chelyabinsk
description: Good spot for a quick night. Close to the mainroad but hidden behind trees, flat spot on tarmac and little mosquitos!

name: Zyratkul national park
description:
Campsite for fishermen with fireplaces and shelters. And a toilet. Nice lakeview. Flat ground with gravel and more gras spots on eastern side. Very little mosquitos. 100 rubel park entrance per person. Take care to leave 50m between your car and lake shore. Friendly rangers are checking this. There is a marking on trees (white dash on green background) when the distance is okay.
Is not for big trucks over 2,8 m. There is an electric cable over street, 600 m before the place.

name: Camping progress
description: The leafy garden of this "house of culture" has been transformed into a campsite. Great central location in St.Petersburg on Vorsby side. Few minutes walk from metro. Site is Not marked anywhere, it is a little alley hugging the fence to the right of the small church on Lesnoy Prospect nr.17 apt.2. 20‚Ç¨ or equiv in rubles

name: Bushcamp
description: Bushcamp at a minor road. One can hide behind some trees. Not too much traffic. No 4x4 needed even when it is raining.

name: Orda-Diving-Cave
description: One can rent the diving equipment. One can visited the impressive cave entrance for free. www.ordacave.com

name: Great Ice-Cave of Kungur
description: Guided russian Tours on 10:00, 12:00, 14:00. Great Experience!

name: Perm 36 - Gulag Museum
description: Perm 36 - Gulag Museum. English Audiguide available. Opening see: www.itk36.ru

name: Hide out in the wood
description: Hide out in the wood. Beatyfull place, nobody here. We reach it with a 2x2, but if it is raining 4x4 may be needed. Pass the Datscha-Base and then take the dirt road at the end of the village, the dirt road is not listed in openstreetmap.

name: Hide out in the wood
description: Hide out in the wood. Nobody here. If it is raining 4x4 may be needed.

name: Workshop cars all brands
description: Right next to campsite. Can do pretty much everything.

name: —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä —Å–µ–º—å–∏ "–ö–∞–∑–∞–Ω"
description: Directly  at the Wolga-side. There is a viewing-platform in at least 40m height, 360 Degree Panorama over all the town. 100 rubel. Great!

name: Storjanka (guarded parking lot)
description: Storjanka (guarded parking lot). 7 Minutes to walk to the Kremlin. If you stay on the north side of this place the street is not too noisy, no big Trucks around here.

name: Academie hostel
description: Nice hostel. We parked our campervan at the parking in the backyard. And used toilet, shower and WiFi. Paid only 200 roebel a night.

name: Hotel Malina
description: Nice and tidy hotel. Rooms are well equipped, bathrooms are great and you can park in the courtyard behind the hotel. We paid 2200 rubles for a double room for one night.

name: Hotel –ê–º—É—Ä
description:
We stayed here because every other hotel was full (try Hotel CMAK first) 

It was functional but not really cozy nor clean. You can park right outside and they have security cameras as well. Payed 1800 rubles for two people and one night.

name: Links Ltd.
description:
Shipping company for cars, vans and motorbikes. Fares vary depending on the destination, and they ship by cargo freight and rail freight. They can safely store your vehicle until the moment the ships start loading and can do all the paperwork for you. Svetlana and Yuri speak english as well and are eager to help. Contact them before going to the office because they are not always there.

Tel.: +7 (423) 222-0887
Fax: +7 (423) 222-1578

name: Bushcamp at the edge of a field
description: Close to the main highway, behind small woodland at the edge of a field. There is a dirt track from the main road leading into a field, follow it until after the little forest. Plenty of space.

name: Veliki novgorod
description: Napoli pizzeria; good pizza's. They have other Italiaan dishes too. Free parking in front of the restaurant.

name: Another one close to the m6
description: Just another calm spot close to the m6, nothing special but convenient for the long haul. Nice grassy spot behind some trees in the fields

name: Veliky novgorod
description: We camped on a public parking Close to the river. Quiet at night, No facilities. Close to pizzeria Napoli which is mentioned in the lonely planet.

name: Strange man on a hill
description: This whole are is is easy for bushcamping. This particular spot is a few km on a dirtroad, this road initially leads to a strange statue of a man overlooking the steppe, continue onwards and you will find heaps of empty steppe to camp on

name: Camp site at Cherkassy backwater
description: Camping, cabins and dachas. By the river. Great place!

name: Riverside
description: one off the many places in the Altai. beautiful flat place on the River. In the beautiful landscape of Altai. for smaller cars,they can drive over the bridge on the other side.

name: in the place
description:
good dr
inkwater.  locale use. ok√© ............

name: Gurman / –≥—É—Ä–º–∞–Ω
description: They serve camel steak here ... among many other things. If you are lucky your meal will be accompanied with some merry French chansons by an Congolese singer!

name: Viewpoint hill at lake
description: The gps points are for a little hill you can drive on for a great view of the area, around here are millions of options to camp, next to the canal or next to the lake,. 200meter west of here you can swim in the lake if you do not mind getting your feet muddy. Area is popular with fishers who also spend the night here. They did not bother us.

name: Wooden Yurt Rental
description: You can rent a semi permanent wooden yurt. It is hostel style and 400 rubles per person. Sauna available for 500 per hour. Has 2 skylights for natural light during the day and electricity at night.

name: In the Grasslands
description: Boarder closed early so we needed a place to stay. Came off highway and approached from around the backside of first set of hills.

name: Hostel Hansa in kaliningrad
description: Nice place to stay. We had a room with private toilet. You can park the car on the premises. We paid 25 euro for 2 nights. A small shop is around the corner.

name: small lake
description: it's a nice spot next to a small lake. hidden from the road. there are tables and some fire places. some people came swimming in the evening but at night is was quiet.

name: big supermarket (tri kota)
description: big supermarket with EVERYTHING - good meat, fresh vegetables & fruits, european products, russian salad buffet, alcohol, camping gas etc.

name: propane station
description: they filled our propabe bottle from the usa without problem

name: chinese market (off-road eldorado)
description: chinese market with of off-road car parts and camping equipment

name: river parking
description: it's a gravel parking on the river. it was very quiet at night.

name: Gas Station
description: Gas station in Yuktaly (private house). the price is a little bit higher (50/l).

name: Chipollini
description: The lunch menu is hard to beat. Soup, salad, bread, main course and a drink - all for 120roebles (about 1,5‚Ç¨ at the time)

name: Mama Roma
description: Excellent Italian restaurant. Speak even some English. Pictured menu, reasonable Prices.

name: ATM for RUB, EUR and USD
description: The atm are inside, the place is called Alpha Bank  (–ê–ª—å—Ñ–∞ –ë–∞–Ω–∫) one has euros and the other dollars. On a safe street.

name: place in forest
description: 200 meters from a small road into the forest at a crossing with enough space. Way to other place nearby was muddy after rain and too many mosquitos to explore it by foot.

name: vehicle insurance office
description:
In small building with blue roof.
Printer was not working and we had to go to the office in Kingisepp.

name: vehicle insurance office
description: In Karl Marx Prospekt 18 or 24. Closed on weekends. Entrance on left side of building.

name: Parking at Alexander Newsky Church
description: Some tourists in the evening, quiet in the night.

name: Parking at railway station
description: Quiet place close to a monument at the railway station.

name: place at lake in forest
description: Quiet place at a small lake in forest. Larger vehicles use the indirect road coming from the north (not direct shortest road from main road).

name: parking at harbour and submarine museum
description: Quiet in the evening. Many tourists from the ships during the day, but still quiet.

name: near bridge at lake near Ryumino
description: Close to not usable "parking" on OSM map. At a spot where the road is wide enough to let pass other vehicles.

name: parking Ferapontov monastry
description: Parking on the back side of the monastry.   No other tourists here because there is a parking closer to the monastry. Some local people passing by.

name: parking in front of Kirillov-Belozersky Monastry
description: Quiet in the night. In the evening some cars curving around the parking, testing their tires and musical equipment...

name: Good mechanic
description: Good mechanic, properly equiped. Only Russian spoken, but knows well Google Translator

name: Road leads trough Inghusetia
description: Beware! This road goes trough Ingusethia. Check current situation before going. It was ok in summer 2017, but in Ingusethia be prepared for many checkpoints. Checkpoints are manned by heavily armed military. They are bored and have not seen female companion for a while... All of them will stop you and try to extort a bribe from you. Classic story is that you are not allowed here (military area,..) and they have to take you to the central office 300km away. But of course they are willing to let you go for a small fine (straf) in cash. They will even write you an "official" fine - that you cannot copy, photograph or get a copy of (because it is fake). This is all BS of course, do not pay bribes please. The area is under"control" of Russian army, but it is generally a lawless region. Local people are predominantly Muslim, so act accordingly.

name: parking Swijaschsk
description: Parking in front of Swijaschsk. Many cars and visitors during the day, quiet in the night. More wild places also for tents available along the road to the parking.

name: Parking Weliki Bolgar White Mosque
description:
Large parking in front of the mosque.
There are more parkings around the UNESCO world heritage Bolgar complex. Toilets open during the day.

name: Parking near Church and Ferry
description: Parking near a church close to the road to the ferry from Ozerki  to Kozmodemyansk. Some trees and bushes form a hide.

name: In the fields close to border
description: Quiet spot off the road to the border. Enough space for several vehicles and tents. You can also camp at the lake nearby, but there will be even more mosquitos.. Beeline signal, cannot judge internet speed, as we were still in our Kazakh SIM card.

name: 4x4 techcenter
description: All 4wd car service. A lot of OEM parts. Can't english speaking personal, just translater use.

name: Friendly hostel for the night
description: Hostel with kitchen and sauna. 800 rub per person per night. Kitchen available but owner will cook food that you bring as well.

name: Gatova
description: Absolutely delicious all home made junk food (delicious home made bread, sauces, home made lemonade, ...), also vegetarian! Under the bridge near the stairs of Ob river... nice walk around! Evenings only

name: best master
description: Very good mechanics place, we fixed eberpasher heating system here.

name: Spare parts
description: All truck garages here to find new spare parts.

name: Hidden place next to a lake in the forest
description: peaceful camping place in the forest next to a beautiful lake with a wooden picknick table

name: beautiful place at the lake
description: It's a great and peaceful place at the end of a gravel road (4x4 is useful after heavy rain because of the mud). You'll find gras there, fire wood and a nice spot to swim.

name: Green Roof Guesthouse
description: Very nice place. Family atmosphere, private house with a couple of nice rooms. loads of space for big rigs. garden. outdoor pool. 1500 ruvel for a double room. parking available.

name: Little Beach Hideout
description: At the northern end of Khvalynsk village there is a 150m long stretch of fine Sandy Beach with a nice space even for big rigs right at the Volga river. Bathing possible, although a signs says otherwise. The locals swim here some village dudes hang around here (nothing annoying, so far pretty peaceful and relaxed atmosphere). The spot is hidden from plain sight from the village due to nice tree line. Clean as well, there are bins around. Good mobile network coverage. Shops in walking distance. Bush toilets available.

name: by the Volga river
description: Nice place by the Volga river. Some local families also camp here, mostly for fishing. Excellent MTS phone coverage. Quite a few mosquitos. No water, except the river. There are shops in the nearby village.

name: Wild Camping üèïÔ∏è
description: Nice and quiet place by the river, with a wooden table and two benches. Good for camp fire. There are a few similar places near by. Just follow the small road from the main one, along the river. The track is narrow and a bit sandy. Good MTS phone coverage. Some local people may pass by, walking, but quiet overall.

name: Wild camping near river
description: Good place to wild camp. Other places nearby. Locals may come fishing here. Campfire is ok. Good MTS phone coverage.

name: Stolby's path
description: Entrance to the main path to the Stolby's... also small parking here but big campers won't fit.

name: Blue Lake Beach
description: Nice Lakes. Southern Lake is fenced. Northern is free, Sandy ground in pine forest. Sandy beach and clear water. Loads of space. Across lake some campers. Looks like it can be crowded during day. Easy accessible from road. The place is not visible on Google Maps unless you use a images. Good network coverage.

name: Toyota Center
description: In depth check of car. Original parts available. Always somebody around speaking English. Pretty expensive - as usual.

name: Lake shore
description: Flat place on the lake shore, pic nic area... seals here in the water!

name: M3 Moto
description: Very friendly guys own a motorcycle place. Clean workshop with professional machines to straighten rims (both cast and spoked) and many more things. They sell motorcycle accessories and clothes, tires and motorcycles. They also have small houses for rent and plan to build a hotel.

name: Truck Parking - —Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∫–∞
description:
One of many guarded parkings, where truckers and other domestic travellers spend the night.

Close to road but no earplugs needed to sleep well.

Very tasty good in restaurant left of the entrance of the parking lot.

100 Rubel.

name: Maksim workshop
description: Maksim speaks a bit of English and knows his stuff about terrain vehicles. He arranged original Toyota parts within 2 days. New steering rack, rod, bushes and front ball bearings. It's a small garage for 1 car. Building has a blue top.

name: wild camping naar river
description: Spot with lots of straight patches, fire places and wood around. Good distance from the road. No buildings and no garbage. No facilities. Could be people here in summer. There's a nice beach near too.

name: Hotel Viola
description: A private little "hotel" with clean rooms, shared kitchen and shower. They charge 900 rubles per person and 150 for parking inside their gated garden. Very safe for motorcycles and comfortable for riders :) Wifi is available but works in waves and one load of laundry costs 100 rubles. Breakfast included.

name: Gorky Street
description: 300 rubel a night. safe parking behind the hotel

name: baikal museum
description:
really interessting. 370rubel 

all about the baikal lake. you can also watch a film and use a microskop to see the microorganism. 

open at 9am to 7pm

name: parking at fullstation
description: parking at fullstation. 24h open. save. flat ground. nice people. easy for a night. on the way to olchon or back

name: Spot in the fields
description: top Spot in the middle of a field. very calm and friendly locals on horses

name: Wild camp
description: a few km from the road and very well hidden away. lots of options to camp and suitable for tents and big rigs etc. No facilities at all but nice surroundings

name: Soul Kitchen
description: Weary from days on the road. Looking for a roof and a warm bed for a day or six. You really can't do better than here. This is the best hostel I have found. Plenty of hot water, comfortable beds, and the nicest friendliest staff this side GLeeMONEX wonderland. They taught me to cook several Russian traditional favorites and kept giving me excellent home made deserts like merengues. Downsides might be parking; it's on street. It is a quiet street which is an oddity given how close it is to the center. My bike and another have been parked out front with no issue. This is also not a place to camp out in a car and rent a shower. If you are looking to get off the wheels and explore St. Petersburg there is no better place. 13.50 euro a night for a single bed.

name: E-30  near Kiritsy
description: A quiet place near a lake , 3 kilometres from the main road.

name: Chaadaevka M-5
description: Near the M-5, 500 meters from the main road. Better than Stojanka!

name: forest
description:
folow the way 500meter more. (gps wasnt working over there) 
camping in the gras next to the forest. quiet and safe. close to the main street e 30. perfect for a night. 
! impossible to pass the road by rain!

name: lakeside
description: wild camping at the lake. a beautyfull place. fishing alloud.

name: waterhouse
description: drinking water and normal water. for 20rubel

name: forest
description: nothing special. quiet place in the forest. not fare from the main street. good for a short night.

name: lake
description: next to a lake. many moskitos. loud from the train. ok for e short nigth.

name: Riverside
description: Nice Place directly on the river Ob with sandbeach and fireplace.

name: cotton field
description: wild camping in a cottonfield. not fare from the street. good for a nigth. impossible to drive without 4x4 by rain.

name: stolby nationalpark
description: parking to the entrance of the nationalpark. great place for hiking in the nature. lot of animals.

name: Behind Stojanka
description: A good place near a small river, behind stojanka (100m). it's a little bit noisy from the street.

name: Camping Elochka
description: it is possible to take a room for 2500 rubel, or sleep in the RV vor 1000 on the carpark. vor 250 rubel per person you can take a shower. it is a nice place directly on the angara river. lot of attractions for turists, but it isn't cheap.

name: Chistoff laundry / —á–Ω—Å—Ç–æ—Ñ
description:
laundry service. 
100Rub one machine. dry 100 aswell. they help you and you can come back in 2h to pick up your fresh closes.
entrance behind the house downstairs. Follow the smell of washing powder... little bit tricky to find. 
open from 8.30am to 8pm

name: Gas Station
description:
Gas Station. you can fill the tank or buy a bottle. good service
a bit difficult to find the way. its a dirt road direct from the main road. (you will see the station from the main road)

name: passport control
description:
checkpoint passport control. last check bef
ore border control

name: car insurance only for russia. on the other side for mongolia.
description:
you can do a insurance here for russia. you can do diffrent options
15 days or 30 days and many more (price depend on your joice of days) 
fast and friendly

name: border point to mongolia
description: border Russia-Mongolia / Mongolia-Russia.

name: Camping next to river in small town
description: Perfect stop next to road and next to river. Lots of firewood, beautiful river!

name: Kaltushnaya
description: Public Beach. Great view. Maximum height 3,50 meter to access this place.

name: Vydrino Beach
description: Beach close to the village Vydrino. Long stretch of sandy beach. Maximum height to access this place 3.50 Meters

name: #roadtobaikal
description: Parking right in front of the River!  Fishingspot right there! Water is cool!

name: Surmin Moto Point
description: A small workshop and a good mechanic for motorcycles. Yuri speaks a little English and welcomes travelers warmly. If there is something that he can't fix, he knows other places in town where it could be fixed. Prices are very decent too.

name: Insurance for Kazakhstan
description:
A small house by the road sells insurance for Kazakhstan. A month for BMW F800GS motorcycle costs about 6000 Kazakh Tenge. Lady accepts payment in cash only, but takes rubles or US dollars. Also serves coffee or tea for clients and has a toilet. 
All through the village towards the border they have lots of offices which sell insurance too, if you have time, you can compare the prices.

name: Camping by the river/nice hanging bridge
description: Very nice place to put up a tent or park your camper. Five minute ride on a paved road away from the main road. There is even a little sandy beach :) and lots of wood and stones to make a fire.

name: Flat ground in between mountains
description: Nice flat spot little higher than the road, so you will only hear the river in the distance. Nice view over the mountains. Access via dirt track.

name: Nice spot close to highway
description: Flat areas of grassland. Possible to stay at a small lake as well. Access is via dirt track. Can be very muddy after rain.

name: Mayak Hotel in Omsk
description: Very descent hotel with good breakfast. They do registration and give discount when you arrive after 10pm. Right in the center of the city with sights and shops close by.

name: Best coffee place in Omsk: Skuratov
description: Skuratov coffee roasters has it all: industrial atmosphere, wifi, good place to write your travel blog, and above all great coffee. We had a small talk with the baristas. Very lovely people. They have 6 coffee bars in town. The one we visited is right across the big church.

name: Tulun
description: We got our bottle filled 5 l for about 300 Rubel. Good service. It was a German bottle, he needed no adapter.

name: Yekaterinburg Toyota garage
description: Licensed Toyota garage. We serviced our land cruiser here. Did some filter and oil changes, replaced rubbers. They speak English and were very friendly. Prices are fair.

name: Surfer's camp
description: Somewhat established camp with a pit toilet and 5 or so separate spots for cars. Space for maybe 10 tents, too. Probably very busy on summer weekends. Only one other car when we visited on a Wednesday night. Less than half an hour's drive from the city. Supposedly there are lots of camping options in this island, yet this one seems closest to the city. Access road is pretty bumpy, so nothing for super low clearance vehicles. Megafon 4G signal. Free

name: Mall & big supermarket
description: Very well stocked supermarket, big assortment of fresh veggies and fruits, meat, dairy products, pastries and take away food. They also have engine oil, tools, household items etc. The mall itself is super modern like any of our European mall, with international brands.

name: Kazan: temple of all religions
description: Decide yourself if this temple is a piece of art or someone's kitsch creation. Not the most impressive but if you're in Kazan it is worth a short visit.

name: at a kliff
description: camping close to a cliff. beautyfull fiew. nice  walk to the river down there.

name: self-service laundromat, house no. 85/1
description:
Nice little place with laundromats and dryers. 250 r for 7kg laundry, 100 r for drying.
No English is spoken but very friendly lady who helps.

name: Kakadu hostel
description: Super friendly and helpful English speaking personnel. 100ruble Secure Parking 50 meters down the road to the west. Cafe and markets nearby as well.

name: Gostiniza Halbstadt
description: Hotel and Restaurant with Rooms and RV Parking. Electricity and water for RV is available. It is possible to take a shower and use the banja.  The owner is German ( speaks really good German).

name: globus hotel and hostel
description: a lovely clean and central hostel and hotel. Not expensive and parking outside. nice staff too.

name: Free Parking in central location
description: A big asphalted area where locals park their cars, mostly during daytime. At night it's rather empty. It's completely for free to stay here. We parked in the back corner where the two walls meet and heard little of the street noise. There is a decent supermarket across. You can easily walk to the center by foot.

name: Hotel TriA
description: A very nice new hotel right next to the main road to and from St Petersburg. Fantastic staff and a great restaurant next door. Even hand wrote out the breakfast menu in English for us! Around ¬£37 for a double room with a sofa.

name: autocenter Lider
description: Great guys running an excellent shop. Only original parts and good analysis. Boss speaks good English and is extremely helpful and thorough.

name: zeya river Natalyno
description: Great campsite near the river. Beach in summer! Fishermen...

name: bank primorie
description: Place to exchange dollars or euros in yens

name: Cafe –ö–ê–§–ï 24
description: Here we‚Äôve tried the most delicious dumplings in the whole world! The owner is very nice guy and has a small museum here and paid parking for the night with toilet

name: Avtolider Sto / –ê–≤—Ç–æ –õ–∏–¥–µ—Ä
description: Big place with motionless ramps. Friendly guys. Helped me out with grease and brakes. Little English spoken.

name: Cheap garage
description: Got our cam belt changed here. Nice guys, fair prices and did the job right.

name: Nice guys
description: Welded our exhaust on the cheap! Really nice guys but not very good with English.

name: SUPERMARKET
description: Best supermarket in town. stock up here!

name: gostinitsa millenium
description: Good hostel place. A few parking spots outside with camera security. Very nice helpful owner who speaks good English. 450r for a bed.

name: Attended parking lot for trucks and cars
description: This parking lot has a security guard and simple toilets. We paid 180 rubles per day for a truck. You can use an electric plug for battery loading.

name: Lookout over river Volga
description:
Lookout over river Volga. Reachable from main road over road with many potholes. Last part needs 4x4 or at least high ground clearance. Maybe difficult if wet.
There are more possible places along the way.

name: On the Field
description: A short distance from the road, behind bushes and an earth wall. Quiet and peaceful place.

name: on the field
description:
Quiet place on a field a distance away from the road which leads to a village at the Volga. Some locals passing by. 
There are more such places around, just leave the main road and look for it.

name: on the field
description: Quiet place on a field close to the Volga. Some locals passing by and working in the fields around this area.

name: at the Volga
description:
Just some meters from the road down at the Volga. There are many useable spots around. 
During the holiday season some Russian campers around, but quiet.

name: Parking Hotel Azimut
description:
Parking at the Volga in Front of the hotel for free, fast WiFi. Close to the Kreml.
Quiet during the day, more or less noisy in the evening because of the usual car drivers.

name: on a Kalmuecken field
description: Over a hill, some distance away from the road. Cars on road visible, but far away.

name: on the Kalmuecken field
description: Some distance away from the main road hidden behind a water channel.

name: Parking Achmat-Kadyrow Mosque
description: In front of the mosque. Beautifully illuminated in the evening.

name: Campspot near recreational lake
description: We found the spot by accident. For 150 rubel we parked our car on the guarded parkinglot. Next to a lake with fun facilities like volleybalnet, boats, beds and a slide into the water. Toilets and restaurant available.

name: Manzherok Camping
description: Large tourist complex with cabins in the woods, with a little area to set up a tent next to an old tank! There are covered seating areas, water, toilets and amazing views over the river.

name: Ferry to Olkhon
description:
Single ferry service to Olkhon island.

Free.

Very busy. Long lanes. Be prepared for hours of queue in July/August.

Officially the Ferry service closes at 9PM but we crossed at 1AM with the very last ferry or the day.
Opening dates depend on the weather.

There are two small ferries that go back and forth to the island. In winter only one ship.
Additional information for winter: there is some time when there is too much ice for the ferry and not enough for the iceroad. That weeks, they use Hoovercrafts, but those are only for passengers, not for vehicles. So if you want to go in winter, ask before going.

Motorcycles seem to be able to cut the line and find whatever spot is available on the ferry.

When we arrived the line was circa 1.5km-long, which usually takes a 10h+ wait average.
Russian families sleep in their car overnight to stay in line.

name: Camping Uzur
description:
Great camping spots carved in the woods on the southern slope.

Free.

Very calm place away from the mass of tourists. 
Great views on the lake and sunrise.

Easy to access with your own vehicle.

Although there is not official sign, there were other campers and fishermen. Plenty of wood to make fire.

name: Parking of a church
description: This parking is situed along the transiberia road, guarded by a friendly guard all the night, free, little bit noisy but good for a quick night. There is a little park with a beautiful church to visit and a restaurant not far away. The pit toilets were closed at the time we were there.

name: Rest area
description: Large parking with toilet, mini-market and restaurant. Secured by camera and friendly people. Possibility to park at the back out of view. I think there are rooms available at the restaurant, not sure. We ended up here after having failed to find a quiet place in Novossibirsk.

name: Yasnaya Polyana
description: Amazingly cosy hotel not far from the main road but in the middle of the trees. One double room was 1600RUB a night. There is no private bathroom but there are two very clean and well furnished bathrooms for 6 rooms. Private parking as well, and on top of this, people are very friendly, they speak English and are interested in travellers stories. Really nice place if you want to treat yourself after a tough day on the road!

name: Taiga Pitch Offroad Camping
description:
The place is open, but you have to WhatsApp Olga on +79503989256 and Moritz on +79503936192 They will come along in 10 minutes.

Moritz and Olga just connected the newly build camp to the water and electricity. We have no illusion that they will build out this place into a wonderful rest stop along the connection roads between Mongolia and Russia, but also between the west and far east part of Russia.

Olga bakes some irresistible good bread and Moritz can help you out with solving your vehicles  mechanical issues.

We are looking forward to see this place evolve into a full blown overlanders meeting place.

name: Next to sauna
description: Free and hidden parking next to a sauna. One hour of showering and one load for the washing mashine costs together 400 rubel. The place is open 24 hours. The parking lot is between a military checkpoint and the mentioned sauna. A few meters from the road.

name: Kardschin
description: Nice woody area, very quiet, close to a river, swimming possible, campfire possible, bad reception.

name: Overnight parking at petrol station
description: We crossed the border very late and were very tired. We stopped and asked here if we could stay and they said yes. Toilets inside the shop.

name: Phlogiston Hotel
description: Camping in the car park of the hotel. Quite noisy from three road but ok for a night or 2.

name: TELEGRAF hostel
description:
Nice cozy place, clean and well designed. 24/7. Free Parking. Free Wi-Fi. Extra-fee Breakfast. A separate dorm only for women. Air-conditioning in the rooms, total area video surveillance, luggage room, lounge room with TV, books and table games. Shared kitchen (refrigerator, microwave, teapot, dishes and cutlery).
Shopping centers, stores and cafes of world cuisine in a walking distance.

name: The Taxopark of Astrakhan
description: It is a huge place where you can find a lot of good mechanics. The locals fix their cars there. You have to pay 10 rubbel/0.2 euro at the entrance, which has a big gate. Some English and German is spoken. Ask for Roman. We had a problem with the cardan. They organised spare parts over the night and fixed it very fast and professionally. The price for the work was around 1000 rubbel/14 euro.

name: Truck stop fuel station
description: We parked here for a night heading East. Quite noisy but ok for a night. Toilets and WiFi available.

name: Konakovo - Wolga riverside camping
description: Small patch of forest next to the Wolga where the locals often camp in the weekends. The spot was recommended to us by staff of the nearby Riverclub hotel.

name: Majak
description:
In 1957 a huge radioactive catastrophe happened as said, even worse than Tschernobyl. But there habe been several more accidents, the last is reported to have occurred in autumn 2017. Don't drink the water from this region and try to get more information about
 it on wikipedia!!!

name: Base Uhra
description: We camped here in our campervan. It's not strictly a campsite as we woods day in the West but he gave us electricity, and there are showers and toilets. it's a lovely place right next to a lake. We paid 250rub, about ‚Ç¨3.50.

name: Hotel Yaroslavskoye
description: Hotel Yaroslavskoye Camping. There is a car park at the back for motorhomes campervans. We paid 500   100 each for showers (700 total = ‚Ç¨9.50) electricity and water available. Toilets inside reception. You can take bus 61 to town from outside hotel.

name: Awesome spot on the cliffs
description:
Incredibly beautiful spot, 50 m over the volga, when you come here take st least two days for hiking up the hills nearby and along the beach, there is a path leading down to it. Plenty if space, firewood, even simple toilets. I watched groundhogs, foxes, lizards...
I the village there is a small shop. Very quiet, just the perfect spot.

name: Posolskoe  - –ø–æ—Å–æ–ª—å—Å–∫–æ–µ
description: Sandy beach next to Posolskiy Monastyr. One other camper on the site (May 31st) but the numerous trash cans indicate that it might be more crowded in summer time. Public potable water fountain available at the entrance of the village.

name: Easy camp
description: Near the siberian highway and close at litlle village but very quite and peacefull. Good tracks. If you want you can go further in the woods. People saw us but nobody come. Really nice place for a relax time from driving.

name: Masterskaya Konstantin
description:
Konstantin is a good welder, he does electrical repairs and heating circuit. He made us an adapter for the gas bottle (camping gaz) and after he accompanied us to the gas station to check that it worked. He speaks a little English and is very friendly. And he have other friends that they can repair all the parts of vehicle.
Access is here 56.034308, 92.834934 and turn on right in the second alley (dirty street) until at the end.

name: Lukoil with massive car park
description: A very large car park next to Lukoil. We thought it was free but a security man asked us for 100R (about 1 euro). There is toilet and free wi-fi. If you park at the end of the trees, you are far from the road and you can not hear the road anymore.

name: Rest area
description: A big parking area for trucks just off the motorway. Its quite far away so the noise level is ok. There is a restart and petrol station with toilets very close. Phone reception is full bars.

name: Turka Beach
description: A lot of possibilities for any camping-cars. Easy access. Sandy beach. Trees for the shadow. Not too much noise of the road.

name: Parking of supermarket
description: Of course not the most beautiful place but place enough for big rigs, and quite quiet at night.

name: Nordcamping
description:
It`s very cool place in Petrozavodsk (Karelia). Nordcamping is a large campground for the caravans as well as tents with comfortable conditions for travelers. Good prices and very hospitable staff! 
Near the shore of Lake Onega with its harbor and boats, 
Quite close to the embankment and other attractions of the city, on the campsite you can eat delicious homemade food. 
An unforgettable experience for me))

name: Lukoil
description: Big parking area next to Lukoil petrol station. We asked the women who worked there and she was lovely and smiley and said yes, no problem. There is a toilet in the shop.

name: Passport Control to Exit / Enter Russia
description:
Passports and vehicles checked.
Reasonably quiet although not well sign posted.
Russia only at this location

name: Spring
description: A lively flowing spring with crystal clear water. We stopped and filled all our containers plus the water in our campervan. Quite a few mossies though in early June.

name: Truck stop
description: A massive truck stop with nice restaurant and cafe. Also toilets, showers and laundry. Drinking water outside.

name: Parking in Kulchanovo
description: Parking lot in front of a green offcial building in Kulchanovo. Very quiet night (friday evening). View on a nice small church. Place enough for several rigs, no problem for big rigs.

name: tires shop
description:
you can find all kinds of tires here
4x4 , big rigs or car
and some mechanics pieces

name: Lakeshore –≤—ã–¥—Ä–∏–Ω–æ
description: Nice and quiet place on the lakeshore near Vidrino

name: Parking near lake
description: Lots of space to wild camp here. Very quiet and peaceful.

name: Chosovaya beach
description: The Chosovaya river makes a U bend and created a nice wide pebble beach, perfect for camping. The beach is at the end of a 3km long dirt trail, 4wd is probably necassary.

name: Deer Springs / Olen‚Äôi Ruch‚Äôi National Park
description:
The park itself is not accessable by cars. The very friendly park ranger arranged a spot for us to camp with our car & roof top tent on a small patch of grass behind the hotel. We could use the facilities of the hotel. Total costs where 50 roebels.

Across the street - next to the cafe - is a small patch of foresr for regular tents & camping.

name: Sim river & grotto camp
description: Next to the Peshchera Solomennaya Grottos there is an informal campsite with wooden sheds for firemaking and eating. The place has an amazing view over the valleys.

name: Holiday Manor
description: From the road is looks abandoned, but they build a few new holiday houses - with banja further from the road. We were allowed to camp in our car & rooftoptent and use the facilities in one of the houses. It did cost us 1000 roebel.

name: Truck stop
description: We stopped here as it is called 'Kemping' but it isn't, it's a Truckstop. There are hot showers, WiFi and toilets. But the toilets are the worst I have ever seen. Very very bad toilets. WiFi slow. But the showers were very nice and hot.

name: Camping next to hot springs
description: Camping next to hot springs! This is an amazing place to camp. There is a geyser that you can just about attend under and wash and bathe. There is also if place to park and stay for a night. Very quiet, the only noise you can hear is the geyser / spring.

name: Tri Medvedev Truck Stop
description: Tri - Medvedev. parking area for trucks but we stopped here and paid 100rubels for the night. You can also have showers for 150r. Nice owners from Tajikistan. There was WiFi but it wasn't working when we stayed. Restaurant next door.

name: moto motari
description:
shop with good selection of tires,oil etc. 
shop for car stuff next door too.

name: guest house the green village
description:
Guest house with all the comforts ... closed and covered parking .. shared bathroom. breakfast included, located in a very quiet area.1800 rubles double room. washing machine service is 200 rubles
---
casa de huespedes con todas las comodidades...parking cerrado y cubierto..ba√±o compartido.desayuno incluido en zona muy tranquila.1800 rublos habitacion doble.servicio de lavadora 200 rublos

name: hotel  volga
description:
Simple new hotel with all amenities and closed parking ... very close to the river and the entire commercial area.
Very attentive employees. 1000 rubles the individual and 2400 the double

hotel nuevo sencillo con todas las comodidades y parquing cerrado...muy cerca del rio y toda la zona comercial.
empleados muy atentos. 1000 rublos la individual y 2400 la doble

name: Royal
description:
Secure bike parking in a "cage".
2600 for a double with bathroom,fridge and tv.

name: off the highway
description: spot next to the highway,out of sight, ok for a night. space for a couple of tents or a car, there is a table.

name: Parking lot in Peterhof
description: Secured parking lot in Peterhof, very close to Peter Palace and the gardens. 500 rbl per night. Very quiet at night.

name: Water tap
description: Water tap used by locals. Good drinking water. Free

name: Parking next to hot spring
description: Parking next to hot spring. This is a really lovely place to camp for a night or two. The hot springs are very nice and the owner, Victor is very friendly. We paid 300r for access to the pool and 200r to stay the night. There are drop toilets on site. No other services.

name: Hotel camping Elizar
description: Nice campground in St Peterburg. Close to metro to go downtown. Place enough for big rigs (max high 4m). Hot showers. Very clean. Very quiet. 2 700 rbl per night per vehicle. Enter via Obukholvsy Oborony Avenue nr 89 it is the one and only way in

name: Orda Wildcamp
description: Next to the famous Orda cave - diving only - you find a valley overlooking the city and Orda river. We found a quiet spot between young trees. Just follow one of the many dirt tracks.

name: Barbaris
description:
Nice large+clean rooms. got the double for 2200 after showing the price on booking.com. secure parking outside the hotel +200 for 2 bikes. they also have a good restaurant.
sauna and swimming pool at additional charge available.

name: Motel+Canteen
description: motel with canteen in same building. ask in the canteen for the rooms. basic but clean. showers not in rooms. 1300 for a double. possible to park bikes in front of room.

name: Next to the river
description:
Next to the river in the village. Quite, good beeline coverage, you can wash in the river and make fire. 

We tried to drive from Sentelek, which is about 30 km away from here, to Korgon. This is a seasonal path. We got it half way on a quite nice path but then there was a landslide on the street. But the ride to Sentelek and the half way was worth it. Very beautiful!

name: Hunter Hostel Camping in car park
description: Private parking behind Hunter Hostel. We emailed in advance to ask if we could camp in our van in the private guarded parking. We agreed a price of 800r to park and use showers and toilets and WiFi. Very safe parking, out of sight of road. Very friendly staff but not much English spoken.

name: Ogni Murmansk
description:
MODERATOR NOTE: Location is corrected. 

‚ÄúOgni Murmanska‚Äù campsite is located in a picturesque spot 255 meters above sea level with a stunning view all over Murmansk city. The campsite is easy to reach from the federal highway M18. A convenient location of our campsite will allow you to enjoy the beauty of north nature as well as main sights in Murmansk city. We have been working as a campsite for more than 20 years.

There are electric hook-up points to caravans; you can replenish supplies of drinkable and process water, use chemical toilets and laundry services.

The campsite is located at the territory of hotel and restaurant complex ‚ÄúOgni Murmnaska‚Äù that will make your stay even more comfortable. You can visit out cafes, restaurants, indoor water park with saunas and recreational park. For an extra charge campsite visitors can use hotel rooms with all modern facilities.

There are barbecue spots and rest areas on the territory of our campsite. We also provide a large selection of leisure activities: ski slopes with lifts, snowmobiling, dog sledding during a winter season; lake fishing, boating, and bike renting services during the summer. Also in our park you can meet husky dogs and different animals in a petting zoo.

name: Marx
description: Direct at the Water, there are lots of  spots to camp and swim along a tar road. If one is occupied you just look for another.

name: uyut
description: 1800 for a basic room. bike parking in a garage, 100 per bike. enter at the sign "Ka—Ñe" and head right up the stairs before entering the canteen.

name: Parkingsite at entrance Stolby
description: It‚Äôs 2 kilometers up the road from the entrance. It‚Äôs not possible to drive further without paying 1500 roebels. The parking is quiet at day and a little busier at dusk (5 cars). We camped 2 days and felt safe and had a lot of conversations with locals walking by towards Stolby. Next to the parking are some pit toilets. The first Stolby is a 4km further up the road.

name: hostel globe
description:
economic hostelin the city with place to park motorcycles .. is within a market area very well connected.
500 rubles a night in a room and shared bathroom. there is a kitchen and washing machine and the staff is very friendly
---
hostal economico en.la coudad de barnaul con lugar para aparcar motos..esta dentro de una zona de mercado muy bien comunicada.
500 rublos la noche en habitacion y ba√±o compartido. hay cocina y lavadora y el staff es.muy amable

name: Bush Camp near the river
description: open field wish shady areas, walking distance to village. Close by you could also camp next to the river, however we should pay RUB 500, so we decided to move on. Totally quite place except for the bells in the morning.

name: A108 Motel
description: Cheap and clean room. Sits just off the main road in a private area with security guard. I could take my motorbike and park it next to my room.

name: arshan
description: beatifull village with medical water springs, waterfall......nice place to camping near the river...good and long, bazar....is touristic place but good.

name: Guesthouse Igor
description:
Family guesthouse. 3000 rubles per person with dinner and breakfast.
Sauna and garage for motorcycles

name: Altay Moto
description: They have a guesthouse and do motorbike rentals and tours, but I came here for maintenance: Vladimir helped me change my fork oil. For big repairs he has contacts in Novosibirsk.

name: At the river, out of sight
description: Very clear (and very cold) water, loads of space, enough firewood around.

name: Ongudai
description: Vladimir of Altay Moto advised against filling up at small petrol stations. Go to this one in Ongudai and the one in Kosh-Agach instead.

name: Mars in the Altai
description: Nice little excursion during your transit through Russia. Red, yellow and green hills that you can explore freely. They're in the process of constructing a banya, restaurant and cottages as well. We paid 100 RUB per person for parking/entrance. Just follow the hand-painted signs from Chagan-Uzun to get here.

name: Hotel Tashantskii
description: We were escorted to this hotel by border guards who found us wild camping in the border zone. Everything is brand new, not even finished in some places. 2,300 RUB for a twin room. (Dorm bed would have been 850 RUB.) Shared kitchen with stove, oven, microwaves, kettles, everything. Wifi available.

name: Camping next to old station
description: A great little place to camp next to the Trans Siberian Railway.

name: Road side spring
description:
Nice fresh water spring. Great for filling water. very cold
take the other point

name: Magnetic Wake Park campsite
description:
Campsite with facilities, shower and toilet. Quality is not too high but friendly people and you can have a drink at the bar. You can do wake boarding lessons there.
They have European caravans for rent, but you can also (after some discussion) camp with your vehicle. We paid 1000 rouble per night
A bit noisy from the road next to it.

name: Avtoservis
description: A really amazing garage who helped us with our Fiat Ducato campervan. Ask for Alec, he speaks done English, bit with Google translate you can have a conversation.

name: Hotel Amigo
description: A nice little motel in the edge of town. We paid 350r to stay the night in our camper and 2 x showers. Owner speaks good English.

name: Parking near the Monastry
description: Small parking no service, for one night it‚Äòs ok. Near to the monastry.

name: –ú–∞—Å–∞—Å–∏–Ω –ê–ª–µ–∫—Å–∞–Ω–¥—Ä (Alexander Masasin's mechanical workshop)
description:
Excellent and smart mecanic who can solve the most unusual problem. Every problem has a solution! –ú–∞—Å–∞—Å–∏–Ω –ê–ª–µ–∫—Å–∞–Ω–¥—Ä Email: al-masasin@yandex.ru
Adress: Irkutsk, –ú–µ–ª—å–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤–æ,–ò—Ä–∫—É—Ç–∞ –ù–∞–±–µ—Ä–µ–∂–Ω–∞—è¬† 2–ê. 
When maps.me tells you you have arrived, turn right, second gate. You will probably see some Landrovers in the yard :-) 
His place is the left hall.

name: Small side road next to highway (quiet)
description: Nice place to park for a night. About 200m from main road so noise is reduced. Very few cars pass by. There are no services but it's a bit nicer than always staying in petrol stations and truck stops.

name: Dom Guesthouse
description: 2200 for a big double with balcony. secure parking, possible to use the kitchen

name: Sevastyanovka
description: Service-station + guarded parking + restaurant + showers + toilets

name: Camping at the beach
description: Parking lot directly at the beach, where you can park in the shade of some trees. unfortunately a lot of rubbish, but the sea is directly in the front.

name: Altai Guest House
description:
Small cosy basic cabins.
Clean and tidy, we used to get out of 5 days of thunderstorms.
Friendly owner and daughter speaks good English.
Shower and room included in the price 1600 rubles.
Sauna extra 350 Rubles
Breakfast 250 Rubles each and free use of kitchen. 
Without breakfast kitchen is extra 200 Rubles.

We used our own cooking equipment and cooked under the covered bbq area.

Nice and quiet

name: metelitsa
description: nice hotel with pool,sauna and restaurant. 2000 for a twin room, walled parking lot. 150 for breakfast.

name: Parking behind Lukoil
description: Large parking space behind the shop. Inside the shop there is fast WiFi and toilets.

name: Kalachinsk-Omich
description: Parking (free) + restaurant + dervice-station + supermarket + toilets + wifi. As usual, the trucks are noisy.

name: Gimreka
description: Place for bivouac camp near old Church. Quiet and in the landscape

name: lukoil with free hot showers
description: A posh brand new Lukoil gas station with free hot showers. Very nice staff too.

name: Behind Lukoil
description: Very nice new petrol station with large parking area at the rear. Friendly staff inside and free wi-fi and clean toilets inside. Far from main road so very quiet.

name: Wooded area spot
description: Sheltered area in the woods to escape the endless farmland in this area.  Shaded area off the track in the woods.  Just for regular size car/SUV.

name: Federal Migration Service (Visa Registration)
description: This is the place in Gorno where you can register your visa. It's quite hard to find, and don't listen to Lonely planet coz that's the wrong place.

name: Amazing Spring water
description: An amazing little spring with ice cold fresh water. Was quite busy when we were there with locals filling bottles.

name: Kyzil
description: Flat grassy area next to a big water channel. Very quiet. Nice view of the surrounding hills.

name: Ferry spot
description: The ferry operates from 8 to 20 hr , so very quite in the night. Nice views along the water and plenty of space to park. Little beach for swimming as well.

name: Bordercrossing KAZ - RUS
description:
