The motorbike tire that I bought at Nika Moto (500 mtr from here) was quickly and well fitted by the friendly mechanic along the main road here. 
He speaks a little English and is a motorbiker himself. Great guy

name: Guru Hotel
description:
Hotel is not great (reception/entrance under renovation), But rooms are clean, bathroom modern. they do registration, no extra cost. laundry service on request and good parking Area!! within walking distance to old town
. so overall worth the money (we paid 2800 Rubel for twin bedroom, excl. Breakfast)

name: Sandy river banks
description: Many places to set up in this river bend. if you have a small rig you can continue to the sand banks a little further on the main track. My truck was to large to pass through some trees, so I chose this instead. Very quiet, only one fisherman in the morning. Mosquitos of course. Good H+ reception on beeline.

name: In the Forest
description: Between trees in the beautiful Siberian forest. Various options and spots, lots of shade.

name: Sandy place next to the river
description: Accessable through a bumpy road, lots of sandy tracks which allow wild camping with a beautiful view to the cathedral of Wladimir. No toilet or other amenities. A bit noisy because of the train station on the other side of the river. A few fishers around in the evening, no problems. Making a fire is possible. A lot of trash and some mosquitos :-(

name: Camping near little river
description:
nice spot with trees and little river. lot of firewood, fresh cold water from river. nobody will disturb. calm at night.nice to camp with the tent, too. no trash. 
mosquitos and biting flies ( in German: bremsen)

name: Georgian restaurant
description: Georgian restaurant - for anyone who's longing for a tasty khinkali or khachapuri! English menu, Vladi prices. Good soups, coffee and dangerous desserts. Georgian wine and music

name: Rassvet
description: With the few affordable and safe parking options in the city centre, this offers an ok alternative. Not the most charming neighbourhood, but this place is surprisingly clean and comfortable once you step inside. Most important: out of sight (motor)bike parking behind the building, in front of your window (ask for a room at the back of the building). Cars and rigs will use on street parking - not sure how safe it is, but quiet (dead end street). Away from the city centre, but bus 49 takes you directly to the main square (several other options too); shops within walking distance. 2000 Rubles for a single room, shared bathroom, including (simple) breakfast.

name: Forest camp aside Chuisky tract
description: Nice choice of spots to park your van. Road to nowhere, a spring is down the hill reachable by foot. Small cabin of shepherd on the other side, passed by on horse without disturbing. Not many mosquitoes, no noise of the road, only birds. Setting a fireplace is not recommended due to fire alert in summer. Great place for staying a night close to the Seminsky pereval.

name: Quiet mountain spot
description:
Quiet mountain spot close to a track and not very far from a house. Nice views and shade from some trees.
Not easiest spot to find a flat spot but worked out for us.

name: Hostel Sarkhaus
description: Nice hostel with a big secured parking in the garden. They were fully booked so they only had a really small room available but fine for 1 night. Good showers, toilets and kitchen, all very clean. They don‚Äôt speak English but with google translate you will manage, very friendly!

name: Land Rover
description: Land Rover dealer and workshop. Not so much english spoken, google translate will help.

name: Camping laguna
description: Camping with boat rental, stand up paddling, kiosk, running water in toilet. basic but relaxing. 1000 rubel for motorhome. during vacations locals with tents.

name: Roadside shacks
description: Cafe to grab a bite or drink a coffee. Can sit outside.

name: Trucker rest stop
description:
You can take a shower here for 150 pp. very clean. 
Free WiFi as a bonus.

name: Picnic table
description:
Very nice picnic spot under the shade of big trees next to wheat fields. Quiet and secluded. 
Easy to reach by a dirt road when it‚Äôs dry. Very treacherous if wet.

name: Passport control
description:
Little booth where you give your passport, coming from Russia. 
There‚Äôs an insurance seller as well.

name: Hillside
description:
Good location for one night close to the city. Amazing view.
A couple of cars and motorbikes came by, but they just ignored us.
There is a also a more hidden place close to the bunkers.
Road up here is tricky.

name: water tap
description: There's a water tap in front of a building with fence around. We were told by a local that the water is also good to drink.

name: Spot next to the river Iren
description: Perfect for swimming, making a fire (no wood around) or relaxing. A lot of place, severel gravel roads to chose. Locals were bathing, too. Totally quiet, some mosquitos. Water in the river is clear and refreshing.

name: MTS and beeline SIM card
description:
Here we could buy a sim card.
MTS 5GB 200min for 300rubel.
No English spoken, friendly.
passport needed.

name: Quiet place in the woods
description: Beautiful place in a birchwood, follow the tracks in the grass. Can get muddy after rain.

name: River camp
description:
Nice and totally quiet spot on the river with a rocky beach and sunset-view. Plenty of wood for a campfire. The water quality was great the first day and greenish the next. Unbelievable in this area: We stayed two nights and only one fisherman came by. MTC and some Beeline Internet.
4WD helpful to get there.

name: Gulag
description: overnight stay ok ,approved by guard, secure with video cam. beach spots were flooded, not possible.

name: Grom- Stroy Workshop & Tankomobile shop
description:
Grom-Stroy Workshop is specialised in offroad vehicles but they can help you in any other car problem. Very friendly, helpfull, qualified staff, very good work! Best workshop I've ever been in Russia (and I saw a lot...:)
Tankomobile Shop can order you any kind of spare part you need and they have a lot of offroad fittings on stock. Oleg, the owner speaks english and will help you for all questions you have.
Very friendly, warm hearted people, great russian hospitality! Highly recommended!!!

name: Sandy place - Isetskoe Lake
description: Short but bumpy road, some local fishers and maybe campers, perfect to swim, no amenities, very little noise from street and train, bring your own firewood, limited space for big rigs.

name: Spot at a swimming lake
description:
Several possibilities to park. We stopped there to take a bath, but it's worthwhile to stay overnight. Quiet, no mosquitos :-)
The lake is beautiful and warm.

name: Beach Vladimir
description:
Super nice sandy beach! Pit toilets.
Be careful to drive on the beach, it looks and feels solid but you get stuck easily. Stay at parking area.

name: Camp on the lake
description:
Great spot on the water and amongst the trees. Nice grass area. A bit of litter but not bad and can easily be cleaned up. 
The sandy track to get here is flat and easy to drive on. Some sections, the grass in the middle of the track may touch the underside of an average car. 
Some overhanging branches may restrict bigger rigs of getting in all the way but there are other spots too. 
Didn't notice anybody around but it's too nice a spot with easy access so can assume locals come here. That being said,  I was here on Saturday and there was nobody around. 
Really nice spot.

name: Laundry at Lenta Shopping Mall
description: Good laundry, fast . We've got it back within one hour We paid 700 for about 8kg. The lady running the laundry is very helpful.

name: Na Bulvare Guest House
description: Great Guest House. Room for 2 with own nice bathroom costs 1275 Rub. Very clean place, very friendly owners - the son speaks some English. No breakfast but a big well equipped kitchen available. Free coffee and tea. They also have a nice banja downstairs which you can use at extra costs. safe parking for max. 4 cars. Big vehicles won't fit.

name: Gostinitsa, caf√©, gas station "Mayak"
description: Gostinitsa that seems brand new; quieter than most as it's not directly facing the road. Secured parking at the back with cameras and gate. 1000 Rubles for one, in a room with 2 big beds, shared bathroom. Super clean and friendly. Cafe with picture menu and gas station on the same compound.

name: Borisoglebsk
description: Quiet place at the river, 300 m away from the village. Some people are fishing or bathing, but not too much.

name: Currency Exchange
description:
The only place we could find to buy Japanese money at a decent rate. The other ones on Overlander were either closed on Saturday, didn't have Japanese Yen or the rate was really bad.
This place is open 7/7 from 9 to 20.

Mind you, there were lots of people waiting when we got there (Saturday mid afternoon). We waited 30min total.

name: North of Bielomorsk
description:
Wild camping spot, few kilometers north from Bielomorsk city. Road accessible rather by 4x4.

Beautiful sea tides, views and :64.6002778,34.9505556

name: Niyama and I like pizza
description:
Fed up with all the fat and sweet fast-food in Russia? I was craving for some fresh veggies and tasty food after crossing Siberia; won the jackpot with this excellent restaurant. They have an endless menu, including Asian dishes but also burgers, pizzas and tempting desserts. Real coffee, semi-outdoor terrace facing a little parc and an English speaking waitress who was assigned to my table ;) What else could you wish for? Not cheap, but surely good! 
'I like pizza' is just next-door / sharing the building. Haven't been there, but saw many people waking in and out (also with takeaway boxes).

name: Impassable Steps
description: Track from Osmand is impassable here. Two deep steps. Track from North is passable until here.

name: Camp behind Petrol Station
description:
Camped here enroute to Moscow. 
Large concrete area behind Petrol station. Lots of trucks at petrol station but this is behind it with grass area next to it. Road noise but ok for a stop over.

name: Nice and quiet spot to camp for a night
description:
Seems to be sort of a ‚ÄûPicknick‚Äú or ‚Äûfishing‚Äú place for the locals. 
It‚Äôs absolutely quiet and no one bothered us. 
Lots of insects, though. 
We stayed one night.

name: Drinking water
description: You will need a pump to fill your tanker

name: –∫–∞—Ñ–µ shower flush toilet fuel
description: fuel stop. Restaurant cheap and very tasty. Shower available. Parking available. Clean toilet, 15Rub

name: On Oyat' river
description: Nice place to camp on the banks of Oyat' river. Just a few minutes drive from the P-21 road and on the way to the tranquil Vvedeno-Olyatskiy female monastery.

name: free water at the street
description: you can fill up water , it is next to the street

name: River camp with beach
description:
Great and very quiet spot directly on the river with a sandy beach, trees around and wood for a campfire. We stayed for three nights in July and only saw two fishermen and few cars pass by on the other side of the river. 
4WD helpful to get there after rain.

name: Moto spares shop
description: Small motorcycle shop. We bought chain here. They have also some tires, batteries and other moto parts.

name: Beautiful spot by the river
description:
Very nice spot at the small river. Flat meadow without shade - if you need shade there are spots at the trees nearby. The river is perfect for refreshment in summertime, very clear and cool water. you may be visited by some cows. 
No 4wd needed.

name: Mamma's pizza
description: Where you'd least expect it: very good pizza! Also burgers and some other usual fatty fried stuff.

name: Small forest
description: This track leads into a small forest with plenty of camping opportunities. 2 cars passed by on the evening, but only looked very surprised to see me there. You can hear the road and train, but can't be seen from the road.

name: Forest area by the roadside
description: It's been raining the last couple of days and we found this place to sleep. Not great but it's not visible from the main road, not deep in the forest, and wasn't so muddy.

name: Oda Restaurant
description: Restaurant with above average food, a bit pricey but presentation was very nice.

name: Chulyshman River Spot
description: Next to river, plenty of firewood. No 4wd needed. Nice view, some mosquitoes. At daytime there are some people fishing nearby. Coming from north there are 2 shallow water crossings.

name: Nice Meadow with nice view
description: Meadow with a very nice view at river Laba

name: grass spot next to river
description: many nice spots beside the street. best is under the trees 300m away from street.

name: At the River
description: Great informal campsite with lots of great spots. You don‚Äôt hear the noise of the road because of the little river. Nice fireplace and lots of wood. No Internet. We paid 400. You even have shelter for the rain.

name: Dom Ryadom
description:
Nice and very clean (!) hostel. 
They provide a kitchen, hot shower and laundry service (they either wash your clothes or you can do it on your own). 
We camped in our car in the parking lot in front of the hostel, which is not a very romantic place, but it‚Äôs quiet at night and you can go to the city center of Novosibirsk easily (five min walk to the train station, train takes about 30min). 
There were also lots of local bicyclists who stored their bikes somewhere in the garage of the hostel.

name: Motoshop 'Motoland'
description: Moto parts. Carried front sprocket for my WRR.

name: Camping near Lake
description: Good for a quick night. Near a Siberian highway, very quiet (only a few fishermen). Lake is not suitable for swimming, Lot of mosquitos. Can be very muddy after rain.

name: Drinking Water
description: Drinking water next to the main road. Locals claimed it is free and you can drink it.

name: Wrong way to Mars in the Altai
description: Don‚Äôt go this way if you want to visit Mars. It‚Äôs a rough road which requires 4x4 and high clearence ( don‚Äôt follow MapsMe). Use the road from Chagan-uzun.

name: Emergency sleeping spots close to border
description:
The border took us 6,5 hours, after that we were completely exhausted. We found this area in the middle of the night. You can reach it through a dirt road and there are several small paths crossing. There is mostly just fields around and it is very quiet.
So it is okay here if you really need to sleep.
There is a lake a few hundred metres away also.

name: SIM cards
description: This is a shopping street in the city with several telecommunication shops.

name: Under trees, next to the river
description:
We found this beautiful campsite next to a smaller arm of the river after leaving Gorno-Altaisk. It‚Äôs close to the main road but you are not visible (but you can hear the trucks). Big trees give enough shadow. 
It looks like it can be a busy place but almost nobody was around this time. Smaller fireplaces, very few trash. Some mosquito (but less then we already experienced in this region).
Fit all sizes of rigs. 4G with MTS.

name: Iron Tigers MC
description: Iron Tigers motorcycle Clubhouse. Bunch of super nice guys. Mikael (pres) Sasha (vpres) allowed us to hang until the boat to Japan left.  Toilet, hot shower, laundry machine. Nice AC lounge.  Folding cots in the attic - we used our camping gear rather than dirty their sheets. Workshop on main floor. Source for used parts (replaced our mirror broken in Mongolia). 2 mini-markets across the street, the one on the left you can buy boxed meals as you find in –∫–æ—Ñ–µ

name: Tourist information
description: Good maps of Yekatarinenburg. English spoken. Informative. Just follow the 6 km red line on the pavement! You can get a map with the red line on it.

name: Free parking
description:
Free parking in the center on the square
On a Saturday there was still space at 13 o clock.

name: BURO restaurant
description: Aaaah, European style creative food. We tried several appetizers for dinner like taco's with duckmeat and Burrata with strawberry, basil and tomato. Very tasty, nice ambiance. Several wines by the glass (European prices).

name: Outdoor & Camping Shop
description:
This shop sells everything around outdoors, camping and fishing. Camping gas for stoves, mosquito coils etc.
Everything you might need during your trip - and more. :-) The longer you stay in the shop, the more you‚Äôll find you "need"
Very helpful staff!

name: Car insurance for Russia
description:
This is probably the only place to get your car insurance for Russia if you crossed the Rylsk border.
We asked in several gas stations as well as insurance companies but nobody knew what to do.
In this street (behind Karcher) you can ask for Katja and she can make the insurance for you.
There is a yellow small house (box) next to the street, she might be there. Or behind the industry complex in a little office. But people around know her.

name: Sandy beach (Ladoga lake)
description: Sandy beach between Olonets and Pitkeranta. You can put tents right on the sand. Ladoga lake is cold!

name: Forest/Lake
description: Nice and quite place in a forest next to a lake.

name: Birdsinging forest
description:
A quite place for the night, except for bird singing!
In the morning a few cars pass, but very slowly so it wasnt bordering.

name: Gasstation with propan
description: Gasstation Irbis with propan for tanks. Also diesel and oktan.

name: Big gasstation
description: Big gasstation with every petrol (lpg,diesel,98). And behind the schaschlik bar there is potable water for free.

name: Place by the lake
description: Its a nice places directly at a lake. A lot of locals come to swim, grill, fish. All very friendly and in the night it peaceful an quite.

name: Peaceful riversite
description:
This place is about 500 m away from the main road. Its at a very clear river. The ground is flat gras so it might be a bad place if its wet. But if its dry its perfect. The street is almost out of sight and you can't hear it.
During the day there were some cows and some locals but in the night there's no one around. There are some fireplaces and a lot of firewood. Some mosquitos in the evening. Otherwise very peaceful and quite!

name: Place before border
description: Nice and quite place just before the border to kasachstan. Its at the end of a village and there were some local walking by in the evening. The ground is grass and almost flat. Perfect for one or two nights.

name: Grassy spot next to lake
description:
Its a nice and spot not to far from the many road, but absolutely quite. There is a little hut and a table and bench right next to the lake witch belongs to someone. But just before there is a field of grass quite flat and between to treelines. So its not so windy.
We meet the owner and it was no problem to park right next to the hut under the trees, but if the owner isnt there i would recommend parking on the grass before the hut.

name: River camp
description: Level, grass spot next to a small creek. Only dry spot we found after much rain. A little visible from the road. And yes, road noise. No houses in sight. Shepherd came by with large herd.

name: Temp Hotel
description:
Basic rooms and dorms available. Very clean! It‚Äôs within a sport complex, 4th floor.
Double room ist 1300 P and a bed in a dorm is 450 P. 
Huge parking place but not secured.

name: Boutique Hotel
description:
Not really an overlanding kind of place, because it‚Äôs almost too nice, but it was a life saver after nine hours spent in traffic jams of Moscow. 
Perfect spot if you‚Äôre on your way to Latvia. 
Really nice and helpful staff. 
2600 r for a double room with breakfast. 
Dog was allowed.

name: Iogach
description: Near the bridge on the right side close to the River. You can find flat ground. In the near stay Houses but no one came and didn‚Äôt say nothing.

name: Federov Aparthotel
description: Very nice and cozy place to stay, not a normal hotel but apartments with kitchenette and living room. The guy running the place speaks good English and has been very helpful. Ideal for family, good value for money.

name: BBR Bank
description: Yuri says this bank is the best bank for cash machine withdrawal with less/no commission.  Only Rubles

name: Money Exchange
description:
I tried different banks, most of them only change Euro or Dollar to Rubel. Here I finally could change my Tenge to Rubel.
Exchange rate was: 10 Tenge for 1 Rubel

name: Krown.su Car Cleaning
description:
The best place in Vladivostok to clean a car for shipping to Australia.
Very friendly and helpful guys.
There is a car lift and high pressure cleaner.
We stayed here for 10 days and occupied the box with a lift the whole time.

name: The Village Parking -free
description: Large central flat parking area, free, close to shops, restaurants and lifts. Fits all size of rigs.

name: The Fuel Station Rosneft
description: Not the best choice but it is ok for one night. Behind main building few sites for all size of rigs, safe, free and guarded incl cameras. Very clean toilets inside. Little shop and getting some food, coffee and breakfast. Away from road and quiet good sheltered, gets down at late hours from 10 pm.

name: The Olympic Plaza Parking
description: Between beach and all arenas, close to Olympic Plaza and F1 circuit free parking and overnight stay, camera observed. During daytime busy in late afternoon and evening getting quiet. Free Wifi on beach on plaza.

name: Meridian Truckstop & Hostel
description:
Truckstop with rooms, hot showers, restaurant, car wash etc.
Small cars pay 50Rub, our VW T4 van was 70Rub, bigger cars pay 100Rub per night. 
Toilets clean, shower 100Rub (shower as long as you want). Towel rental 20Rub, which is a good idea if you don‚Äôt like wet stuff in your car/luggage.
WiFi is fast and if you park close enough to the buildings, you‚Äôll have it in your bed on wheels.
We parked behind all the trucks and did not hear any traffic noise with windows open.
Motorbikes park safely between the buildings, invisible from the road.
Reception first floor, door on the left side of main building.

name: Many trees and great grassflat
description: A lot of places. At some parts the grass has been cut.  Good shady birk trees. You can hear the road but we enjoyed the atmosphere. No trash. No water around. Less Mosquitoes than other spots.

name: Plenty of space
description: All along this road there‚Äôre plenty of spots to camp close to the river. Just take any track that leads downward and pick your preferred spot. No mosquitoes when we were there, absolutely quiet, no visitors apart from herds of horses and cows.

name: Quiet spot with bench at riverside
description: A bit far from the main road, but driving into this remote valley you will find this quiet and secluded area. It has a couple of benches, fire pits, and it‚Äôs just next to the river. Bathing is for the brave.

name: Shower
description:
In this small hotel you can take a simple shower for 150 Rubel. Entrance at the back, second floor. She also has rooms.
After the shower we asked her if we could spend the night in the parking lot. She didn't want any money.

name: Termomir (webasto+climsystem)
description: For webasto and climsystem. They do diagnostic for 1000 rubble and they fix and repare for more rubble (i paid 3500 rubble for diagnostic and cleaning of my webasto). Large vehicles can also enter in the garage.Good job and friendly team.

name: Idyllish spot at a small river
description:
Like in the Swiss Alps.
Totally silent, romantic tiny river, no mosquitos. A perfect place to relax and enjoy!
BTW: the whole valley is amazing. No tourists, no rubbish, good (gravelled and normal pathed) roads, possibility to see mooses and deers. Absolutely recommended!

name: Several water pumps along street
description: Just find a working one, some aren't, water looks good, locals use it, free

name: River Bank
description: Many camp sites in this region, just pick one. Good 3G MegaFon reception. Clean place, families and kids swimming in the evening, but very quiet and secluded at night.

name: Zhit Prosto Hostel
description:
Hostel very close to the center . 
450 rubles Shared room 
parking outside in the front of the door with a camera, safe place 
the reception does not speak English but use the translator.

name: Close to Road
description: good spot, saw no one. Down an easy dirt track off the main highway. Close to road but fairly well hidden.

name: Roadside
description: Gravel quarry by side of road. Relatively flat, large area. Not very exciting, can hear the trains in the background on the opposite side of the highway, hidden in the forest, but it won't disturb you. No other vehicles here.

name: –í–ê–ú construction monument
description: Can park your camper right under the memorial, a short track down from the parking laybye, virtually at the top of the hill. overlooks the valley below and the BAM railway. Beautiful rainbow when we were here.

name: Roadside
description: The old road, screened from new Highway by trees. Access from just after you cross the new bridge, coming from the south, drive past the pond with artistic dead trees in it. is the very few remains of an old cafe or fuel station just off the old road. was messy so stayed on the road.

name: Riverside
description: by the river, opposite village of Bolshoi Nimnyr. A rough track entrance just before you cross the bridge, coming from the south. Not the best of places but OK. Can go further down the track following the river but we opted to stay not too far off the road, overlooking the village and river.

name: Side of Highway
description: Picnic and overnight parking area at side of highway. A better place to stop overnight, has a toilet, bin and covered metal gazebo. Plus a good quality metal vehicle inspection ramp.

name: Car Park
description: Car park below power plant.Turn off the highway onto a dirt road, under the pipes and leads you to a small dirt carpark. Stayed here two nights. No problems. Walked up the steep track by the side of the pipes, keep going, a great view at the top where there is a viewing platform by the power plant. can walk along the hill edge getting a great view over Irkutsk. a strange sort of supermarket close by on the highway, opposite the heart shaped heating pipes. Has an ATM.

name: River Ferry Carpark
description: Nearly 10pm when got off the ferry so stayed in the carpark here.

name: Road Rest Area
description: Near the road. Dusty. Toilet. Litter bins. Camp tables and benches.

name: Rest Area
description: Very little traffic. Toilet. Picnic table. Rubbish bins. View over lake.

name: Rest Stop
description: Not much choice coming from Ust-Neva. Virtually no traffic. Truck rest stop. OK.

name: Rest Area
description: Near to road but good when raining and mud around. Toilet, litter bin, memorial and view. At top of hill.

name: Gravel pit
description: Came here after being told we should move from a rest area due to bears. Similar to where we have stayed every other night.  Good internet here though as up the hill from the small town.

name: Rest Area
description: Opposite  a small waterfall and stream. Everyone stops here to wash their vehicles, especially if it has been raining on the Kolyma Highway. Onto good tarmac road now. Can stop here overnight as well.

name: Oceanside
description: End of the road network, by the ocean. A good spot but because the sun finally came out yesterday, a very popular spot for youngsters to drive here and play music and chat right through till after 3.30am. A dirt car parking area with access to a beach of large pebbles.

name: Beach
description: On the beach. Brilliant spot. lots of locals here as Friday night. Still light till very late. If you keep going on the track parallel to the sea you will get to the Three Monks, three small bullocks, with a memorial to the first landing on the coast by Soviet geologists in 1928 looking for gold. Magadan was founded a few years later on the back of what they discovered here.

name: Mask of Sorrow, Magadan
description: stayed overnight in the lower of the two car parks. Raining, but Saturday so a few local cars came up.

name: Rest Area
description: Large rest area, by side of river. Decent distance off the road, not much else to say about it! stopped here on our way back from Magadan.

name: Rest Area
description: Rest Area next to road. Nothing special but in the right place at the right time!

name: Rest Area
description: Not too bad a place considering raining hard when we got here. No toilet or internet. Some bush screening.

name: Rest Area
description: Brow of hill .... and no mosquitoes etc but is raining. Toilet here.  Screened mostly from the road.

name: Riverside
description: Overlooking the bridge slightly further up river. Gravel bed. Great spot especially as the sun came out and a beautiful rainbow appeared.

name: Community Gathering Spot
description: A delightful place, off the dusty dusty road, down a short track. Great place to overnight. And the sun has come out......

name: Rest Area
description: At side of road, adequate. Didn't leave the ferry from Yakutsk till mid afternoon. still on good tarmac all the way from the ferry  Won't be too long before it disappears again.

name: Riverside - Tommot
description: Parked in the shade at the side of the new church being built overlooking the river where people sunbathing and swimming.  No one bothered us. Plenty of spots here on either side of the river where you could stop over as and when the church is finished. Good internet.

name: Stadium Amur
description: Carpark opposite church. Visited here to see the new rail/road bridge built across the Amur River to China. supposedly will open to rail at the end of the year. Fell fowl of the border police as when got to where we could actually see the river and bridge from afar, plus China over the river, we were where we shouldn't be without an official permit. Took about 3 hours to get sorted out, with a school teacher translator drafted in. An official written warning is on our computer records now, but as a first offence they have not fined us. If do similar in the future then will be fines etc. very friendly, courteous and helpful. our very silly fault.  OK here in the village. No tourists visit here.

name: Rest Area
description: The highway was busy, Sunday late afternoon. Large rest area with a tree and hedge etc area screening you from the Highway. oK for an overnight transit stop.

name: Garage, used by Links, Ltd.
description: We followed someone from Links,Ltd across town to here. We have a leak in our fuel tank. We are on our way to South Korea on the ferry next week. communicated by mobile phone to Yuri in the office. Got straight on with the job when we arrived. Somewhere for us to sit and wait. They will try to get another tank, or if not then weld this one. The Toyota main dealer quoted 15 days expedited by air freight from Belgium via Moscow, when we asked the other day. We will see.....

name: Overlooking Pebble Beach
description: Another great place to overnight.  Track ok if you go slow, some places to be found to protect you from the wind off the sea that was blowing when we were here. Fabulous views, despite being a grey, cloudy, miserable sort of day. Overlooking surfer's camp.

name: Airport Novosibirsk
description: ok for one night but very noisy. ok while waiting for an airplane.

name: Tyre repair
description:
On left heading south.
Quick and efficient slow puncture repair. No English but no problem.

name: Spot by Chuya River
description: Great spot by the river. Some mozzies around.

name: Water hose
description: You can fill up your water tank here. There are taps left and right of the street at the caf√©s. Slow taps, but still good.

name: Checkpoint
description: It's a military checkpoint. We told them we are on our way to Georgia and they let us go through without any paperwork. All other cars had to stop to do some administration.

name: Khastorg Supermarket
description: A small supermarket, but little bigger than most shops around. They have Nutella if anyone is interested and they sell a fair range of fruits and veggies.

name: Mitary checkpoint
description: Checkpoint between Ingushetia and North Ossetia. They checked our passports and luggage.

name: Flower hill
description: Great place to stay on a meadow full of flowers. Cows will come by and a few cars pass on the road beneath you, but besides that it's very calm and relaxing. No trees for shade, but along the road you should be able to find some places in the shadow.

name: Near public beach
description: Quiet and flat place near the public beach. We stay over night here on this place. The beach closed at 20 o‚Äôclock the last people are driving at 21 o‚Äòclock. No problems. On the beach no dogs allowed in front no problem.

name: Nice water
description: Nice water. Easy to fill rv. Top quality.

name: Banja u pruda
description: Banja (sauna) in Ekaterinburg. Sergej is very friendly and helpfull but does not speak english and Misha speaks good english and is friendly too, phone number 200 43 44 / Whatsapp +79002124344. You must reserve. It was very very good! Nearly to a park and a little lake.

name: Sleep. Lake and privat Sauna
description: It is city but we did like it. At the end of the road you can turn big rigs. Nice gras flat with friendly people. You can call for private banja(Sauna) and tram is close to walk. Lake has beautiful sunset. We felt save

name: Upside Down House
description: Didn't went inside. But a funny spot for a picture. There is also a Cafe and some souvenir shop next to it.

name: Cafe lounge Vladivostok
description:
You can have a shower for 150 Rubel inkl. Shampoo and towel. There is a quiet room where you can have a nap with seats like in a first class flight. 
Storage for luggage.
The cafe has really good croissants and coffee.  
Very clean, tidy and really helpful stuff

name: Zarya
description:
Single room and one laundry 800 ruble.
Came here because the other hostel won't let me do my laundry.
Very basic, nothing special. But good to come down before boarder crossing. Big Yard as well.

name: Hotel Ivanovka
description: Hotel in a Truckstop with laundry. Price for one machine 100 rubble. We give at the evening and become dry at the morning.

name: Water Pump
description: Water pump with good pressure. Enough space to fill even big rigs.

name: carwash
description: carwash with drinking water, 2 rubble per liter.

name: Free camping at the river
description: Great spot with lots of place to camp, fireplaces, easy access to river for swimming (cold!) or water refill. Beautiful! And free. No service Megafon. Quiet at night, you can only hear the river flowing. We took a hot shower for 150 each at the nearby house, very clean and comfy (inside of a banya, which they also offer).

name: Valentine
description: This is a must do place for all travelers in Russia, local and foreign alike! Valentine is an ex-military amazing hospitable person from Altai, he owns several buildings on a beautiful lake, and he has a little museum-like collection of old Soviet objects. Camping is free in tents or vans. Banya (Russian bath) is free, people play guitar at night around the fire, cook local food for everybody, drink a looot, go fishing and to the waterfalls together. It is a weird and wonderful community! True Russian experience. No connection for Megafon there, but you can get 3G near on Ulaganskiy pass.

name: Quiet spot on a cliff
description: Wild camping in a small pine forest on a cliff. It‚Äôs above the town basically. Great view, flat surface, shadow, Megafon 3G stable. No 4x4 required. How to find: there is a dirt road on the left from the main road going up, just before the market if you come from the north.

name: Tyriet Truckstop
description: Truckstop with nice food and friendly stuff. nice view to the hills

name: mys tashkai
description: near to the mainroad. easy to go. sandy beach.

name: Narrow beach
description: Narrow beach for only one smal 4x4. Alone in the nature.

name: Orenmoto
description: Very friendly and English speaking mechanics for motorcycles. Well equipped

name: Wild camping near to river
description:
Nice place with lot of spot and trees. 
Near to river. 
Near to road but not visible from the road. 
2wd no problem

name: Riverside
description: Small bivi spot by the river. grass and small fire pit. shade in the afternoon.

name: Fresh spring
description: Drinking water. Spring. Cold. By The road. Assured by locals that water was safe.

name: The Olymic Area up in the mountains
description: Several parking sites on the way up, fits all size of rigs, quiet, maybe some locals, lots of security around and lots of cameras. Down in the valley nearly no chance to find a place, only at the tourist bus terminal at the end and behind the guarded area where local utility trucks are parking (right after the guard house and barrier on right side close to river).

name: The Village Parking at Bus Terminal
description:
50m after guard house and barrier on right side before first curve to concert building: ask guard for special car / rig / truck = dom aw kaljossa - parking very strong referring to tourist office!!
There are some utility trucks (Kamaz) and small local buses also parking. It is free. Stayed here 2 nights.

name: Riverside on the way..
description: Away from main road, not absolutely quiet but ok for one night, some other trucks, flat and shady, fits all size of rigs. Do not follow road until beach with a big rig - it is very hard to turn, there is a bridge- tunnel with max app.3,5 m height!!

name: Shady Street Parking
description: Directly road side parking at park with phantastc view from monument, shady, very central, on workdays from 8 am-8 pm it cost money, more or less quiet due to very low traffic in night, close to center and to promenade down at river Don. If you lke it more quiet and away from action) go to other free place (large illuminated parking sites between stadium an river Don)

name: The Arena Side Parking
description: Between Arena and river Don take your choice on several parking sites. Away from busy areas, long walk to center across bridge, very quiet at night. Exception: Festival at riverside or action in football arena. 2 restaurants at riverside

name: Pirs; downstairs: Red Burger Bar
description: 2 locations for enjoying life. Pirs: restaurant with upper level of delicious excellent food. Don't come to late for a good table at the riverfront. In late evening a band will play music. Red Burger Bar on promenade level: very popular pub with food, open until 5 am !

name: Public  Village Beach & Camping
description: Local sandy beach with good river access, lots of trees with shade, Camping with vehicle 500 per night. Lots of places outside around to stay - you can walk in for free. Locals come to beach, very quiet, friendly and familiar.

name: The Old Fortress
description: Area of ruines of old fortress from Don Cossak period beside village. Think about history.

name: The Dead End Road - Riverside
description: Very central but quiet, access from little place in front of restaurant. Road length app 200 m, for short rigs chance to turn, longer rigs go in reverse because if other cars will park it can be hard / impossible to get out. In summer on hot evenings lots of people around on promenade making their thing with chairs and tables but quiet. Opposite from junction with traffic lights also a place to stay but not that quiet and another place 200 m away along main road to south on right side in little parking area but also not so quiet.

name: Riverside for camp and swim
description: Follow track from main road along little river, several places. In the begin no hidden places further away completely hidden and with direct river access for a good swim. Fits all size of rigs, in case of heavy rain could be muddy and 4x4 helpful. Great impressions, quiet, some fireplaces around.

name: Next to the river
description:
One of the nice spot in Altay.
Near to the road but quiet.
Clean, place for fire.

name: Water point
description: Here, there is water pump for refill your tank. Good flow and clear.

name: Between Engels and Gagarin Monument- Pond
description: Pond visible from the mainroad to the Gagarin Monument. Lots of places, not all really covered from the street, lots of bushes and trees, also used by locals for fishing. Grassy bottom, lots of frogs, no mosquitos.

name: Strelna Baltic Parking
description:
Signposted site at the conference centre next to the Constantine Palace.
Unlike our stay in 2015, there is no infrastructure left. The sockets are dismantled, the building with showers and water is closed.

name: Laundry service
description:
Laundry service open from 10:00 am until 7:00pm. Wash and dry. A woman can do it for you. 
Wash 250r. 
Dry 120r.
Service 50r.
There is a parking.

name: Felicita
description: Tasty coffee and a friendly owner who speaks English, she gave us a map of things to see!

name: Partshops and Garage
description: On this street you can find many things that you need for your car or your journey. Many small garages too.

name: Alexejewka Sunrise Camp
description:
Quiet spot on grass with acces to Wolga.
In the morning there was a fisherman starting his small boat. There were no other people besides him.
There's a small city near the spot. MTS connection is enough for Internet.

name: Swedish village hostel
description:
nice hotel 
safe parking 
with breakfast for 500 rubles more 
total 1.600 rubles 1 night private room

name: immigraton mongolia
description:
german citizen, we had an overstay of a few day. procedure tooks long, had to fill out the form again with passport pic. 
paid 10.000 per day per person and 6.000 extra.

name: Free Parking/Urbancamp
description:
Free Parkspace wich i also used for overnight camp. There are more Campers with Mobilehomes.
But check if theres a Football Match scheduled. It would be full. Feeling save because Police checking this area often.

name: Box Hotel
description:
nice Box hotel 
the rooms it's a private box style 
parking for the bike inside 
750 rubles

name: BCK Car Insurance
description:
BCK Insurance Office for OSAGO.

Small office on the ground floor. Only russian speaking but with google translate it worked. It is a good preparation if you have a translation from your documents, so she can find the needed information quick.

We paid 2200 Rubel for 10 days for Fiat Ducato. 
You need Passport, Visa and car document. 

The first insurance we tried, asked for official translated documents confirmend by lawyer. As we found out, this is not true.

name: Water spring
description: A popular water spring along Ust‚ÄôBarguzin - Ulan-Ude road.

name: Terem Inn Hotel
description:
its like a Hotel-Hostel we have a private room.or shared 6 bed room .
I was sleep in shared room for 500 rubles 
big safe parking for the motorbike for cars .

name: 3 Huts
description: 3 Huts to rent, safe Parking for cars and motorcycles, closed by iron gate

name: Russia - Kazakhstan border
description: KAZ --> RUS. Pleasant experience. Took almost 3 hours, but most of it was waiting in the car. Block dispatch, cars and trucks go in separate lines. Officials on both sides very friendly, some spoke a little English.

name: Grassy lakeside campsite
description: There is an unpaved road (muddy when rainy) that turns off the tarmac northeast of the lake. Follow it along the birch forest and take the second right into the forest. You'll end up at a mowed patch of grass beside the lake. Shade provided by birches. Fireplaces and firewood were both present. There were some mosquitos, but the smoke produced by our fire kept them away quite nicely. Some local fishermen present, who didn't seem to mind us and left us alone. A little trash here and there, but nothing too bad.

name: Mineral hot waterpool
description: Very nice and clean pool with hot mineral water, cafe and facilities. Price 300‚ÇΩ pp.

name: Forest
description:
Nice forest spot with beautiful view and some trees for a hammock. Not too far to/from the border. Quiet place.
Some low hanging branches, so not 100% when it comes to big rigs.

name: River Volga
description: Very nice spot at the banks of River Volga. Just follow the track until you pass the Golf Club, then you will turn right. There are many spots to camp with pit fires. Nice sandy beach and swim at the river. No ammenities, just some bins. Few locals gather during the day, quiet at night. Road is not paved, but its ok for 2wd and low clearance. We got here easily with a 2wd van. Free.

name: Chumysh River
description:
Camping at the river next to the bridge.
Turn off from main road 1km west of the bridge to the north.
250 Rubel for 2.

name: Boat Terminal
description: Guarded parking at the waterfront next to the boat termial to Listvanka. Quiet and safe. 150 Rubel per day.

name: Small forest or plantation campsite
description:
Found this place at midnight after making it through the border and finding all the hotels fully booked. 
Just past the petrol station, you will see a dirt track on your left. No signage saying it is private property. As you enter, you will find the track splits off several times into the forest. The track itself might look a bit rough in a few places, but we got through in a small car pretty easily. Wouldn‚Äôt bring a campervan too deep though. We followed the main track for a couple hundred metres up onto the hill and found that it comes to a kind of grassy plateau. 
We set up our tents on the track here, as it was smooth, flat and sandy, where the grass was a bit uneven. The place is quiet, especially if you get far enough from the road, and all we heard was a few birds and animals. Heard some marching/chanting in the morning, maybe this is near a military camp or something? And there was some factory nearby quietly spewing out black smoke, but no people. Otherwise the clearing is surrounded by trees, so I would be surprised if anyone even noticed you were in there.

name: Between the fields
description: Nice, quiet and clean place to stay on the way to Georgia

name: under the trees
description: away from the main road, near a river (brown dirty water), under the trees with shadow all day long. Quiet place, 3 cars passed by on the road. Dont block the dirt track, a car passed by here. There is another place on the right side befor you cross the bridge, more open space. Very weak Edge signal on Beeline.

name: fiat 38 mechanic
description:
repairs ducatos and similar cars. can organise spareparts. 
open from 9-19.

name: Alikonovka river camp
description:
Several nice spots along the river under trees.The marked spot is right next to a mineral water source (seams to be drinkable) and has access to the small river. The place is busy as all cars stop at the source to fill bottles but they did not care about us sleeping there. There are other more quiet places but worse access on dirt tracks. 

Little more into the valley there is a hotel and restaurants and a parking, maybe another overnight stay option. 

Low Edge signal on Beeline.

name: No Name Yet
description: Beautiful location 3 double rooms and two quad rooms. 500 per night

name: The Crimson Island
description:
Nice accomodation in wooden lodges. The lodges are for 4 people, like a small house with 2 bedrooms and private bathroom but you can rent it also for 2 people. We paid 2000 rubles, breakfast not included.
Clean, cosy, good wifi, nice staff (no english but translate will do).
Big parking, just near the road.
Also for tents and maybe campervans (but not sure about the last one)

name: Wild Camping
description: The view is really nice, mountains and the river. Not much visible from the road, nobody came except for a few cows.

name: Truck Stop
description: Big parking lot to sleep in car and motel. cafe and restaurant and shower/banja. quiet at night.

name: Forest Camping
description:
Basic camping in the forest next to a river. nice place, quiet and green. 
The track to drive into the campground is a dirt road and we could not get in because of some ponds. We parked on the main road at the entrance. Very little traffic because the road is a dead end and you need a permit to go further into the mountains. Little to zero signal Edge on Beeline.

name: Vizit City Hostel
description: Normal hostel. 750 rubles private room. safe parking for the bike 100 rubles. 3 days. kitchen, shower.

name: Stalins Bunker
description:
Worth to see.
Bunker for Stalin to protected against the Nazis in WWII.
37m deep.
Visit with tour only. Tour every hour.

name: Pyatigorsk hill camp
description:
nice spot up on the hill next to Pyatigorsk. The small street leads to a church (open 7am to 5pm) and on the way up there are several camp possibilities. 

This spot is right next to the street and not hidden but with a beautiful view and perfectly situated for sunset. This is also the reason why the place is really busy, a lot of locals come up here to watch the sunset. We had visitors until 1am, some of them with loud music in the car. If you want more quiet, maybe the parking at the church is a option (no view) or more down the road. 

4G on Beeline. There is a campground marked on openstreetmap next to this place, we did not check it out.

name: battery shop
description: battery shop. starter battery all size AGM

name: Crazy Island
description: No 4*4 needed. There is a guard.  We spoke to the guard, understood nothing, gave him food for his dog and he opened. We were alone on the island with some broken houses. But felt save. Many place for many card and tents. When we left the gate an other guard told us we would have to pay a fee of 50 Rubel for the car

name: Restaurant, hotel and shower
description: Big parking lot to stay. Restaurant with Russian food and shower for 100. Just ask for it, it is in the 2nd floor.

name: Roadside
description: good spot for the last night  before crossing the border. next to street but not visible. wood for campfire. internet connection is fine.

name: Gas Station Complex
description: Shower, cafe, parking, gas station complex. Clean showers and toilets in a separate building, cafe and market in another building, part of Texas gas station complex.

name: motoremont.ru
description:
nice work shop place. nice owner and great personal staff. I changed my tires here and there is a small shop store to buy some parts for your bikes 
and good prices.

name: Border KAZ/RUS
description: Was at the border at midnight. Small Border station between KAZ and Russia. Kaz Side liked my Overlander. RUS Side very fast, friendly and one off them spoke german.

name: Lakeside
description: Plenty of space, nice small lake, big rig friendly. 2 min from the main road and quiet. Good cell reception with Megafon. On route to Wolgograd.

name: Border Russia - Kasachstan
description: border between  Russia and Kasachstan. it tooks us 1hour. fast bordercontrol and friendly. coming from Russia the streets a fine.

name: Beautiful mountain views
description:
Excellent spot for a night, close to Arshan. Grass might be sometimes a bit high, but lots of opportunities in the area. You can hear the road, but you are not visible.
Amazing mountain views and sunset!!!

name: Lucama cafe
description:
Very nice restaurant with different cuisine. Sushi also!
Nice prices.

name: Green lamp hostel
description:
On Booking too.
Good wifi, staff speak english, private parking just in front (covered) ans secured for 100rub the night. Or free just in front of the building, quiet place. 800 bottom bed and 600 at the top. Just stay one night because after was full.
Just only one barthroom for 2 rooms of 8, were 3 in total so ok but full..
Washing/dryer for 100rub

name: ll‚Äôinisky Pogost
description: This is a small lake next to the R105. Has several picnic huts visible from the road. Drove in approximately 300 meters from the highway to a clear spot next to the lake. Some fisherman and bathers. A little noisy from the road but not terrible, otherwise a good quiet spot for the night.

name: Borovskiy
description: small lake with sand and trees, along the road, without mosquitoes during our visit

name: prtmoto work shop
description:
really a nice work shop for motorbikes 
perfect price for work on your bike .
great owner 
really I would recommended !!

name: in the valley
description: spot right next to the road and a small river. Visible from the road, some traffic in the evening, no one stopped. weak signal (Edge) on Beeline.

name: drinking water
description: next to street good water. locals drink it

name: Beautiful botanical garden
description:
On the main road you will see a sign to the garden. Cross the scarry bridge and follow the track up to the mountain for 1 km. After there you will see the entrance. Costs 150 rubles p.p.
Verry friendly pepole.
Plants are whritten also in latin botanical name. 
Its the most beautiful garden i've ever seen, belive me i am a gardener!
They look also for volunteers for helping there, so if you have time they are very happy if you do some work whit them.
No english speaking, but no problem.

name: Hotel Tsentralnaya
description:
Hotel right in the centre of town.
2300 for a single room with nice bathroom. 
Secure gated parking.

name: Good cheap local Restaurant
description: went here twice while our car was being repaired. It's in a yurt/ger on a parking space. Everything we had was very delicious, borsht, dumplings, soups.

name: Overlooking the river
description: Nice and quiet spot for a night, plenty of options to park. Away from the main road and easily reachable also without 4x4.

name: Kajsubula hotel and camping Dagestan
description:
The best of the best spot in Dagestan! 
If you searching for the beautiful diamond it is here.
There is a most beautiful view ever, very calm, 4-5 small wooden houses, that you can rent (one house is for 4-5 people).

 Breakfast and traditional Dagestan food, everything is delicious and homemade.

Definitely you have to rent a boat from the owner, Magomed (the wonderful person, very care, kind, knowledgeable) and go to the wild island with waterfall and spend the night there! (Take a tent with you). 
Also you can rent a boat with a captain and go to see beautiful montanious Dagestan and small villages from the water. 
This place and people, the owners is absolutely must visit in Dagestan. üíö

name: Camping and outdoor gear
description: Three well equipped shops with camping, cooking, fishing and outdoor gear, inflatable boats, clothing, etc. Some big brands like MSR and Therm-a-Rest.

name: Lazurit Hotel
description:
Great new hotel in the centre of Khabarovsk. Quiet location away from the road with secure gated parking (access is from the street parallel to Lenin Street). Staff is friendly and some English is spoken. 
Good rates for the centre of Khabarovsk, I paid 2800rb for a double including a tasty breakfast.

name: Hostel Agat
description: Good hostel with safe motorbike parking in the garden with closed gate. Very friendly lady at front desk; well equipped kitchen, communal showers, toilet on the floor. Double room 1100 Rubles.

name: At the edge of the forest
description: Not too far from the street and should be reachable even in muddy conditions. Nice and quiet for the night. Plenty of options even further in the forest.

name: Shebalino
description: Directly on the road. Water connection with good drinking water.

name: Lotos Cafe
description: Good stop for Good food at this Cafe also fast WiFi.

name: PocheTb
description: This gas station is 100 kms before Ul√°n Ude.

name: Ust Muny beach
description: Top view. Beach in the village. Gsm. What more do you want?

name: Engels, Saratov
description:
On the p226, 20 meters off the main road overlooking some of the estuaries on the river Volga.
A long strip of grassland that runs parallel to the asphalt for about 1km.
Stayed overnight with no trouble.The road is a bit noisy until late evening but slept well.

name: Travelers Coffee
description: Excelent place for good coffee and good breakfast.

name: Kazakhstan and Russia
description: We bought here car insurance for 30 days in Kazakhstan for a Toyota landcruiser. Decent price (2002 rub). Don‚Äôt speak english, but translate works out. Only cash. ATM in the big red building next to the office building.

name: Iveco garage - Irkurtsk
description:
Iveco garage.
We have an Iveco 4x4 55S17W. While driving through Mongolia, 2 signals suddenly showed up on the dashboard as we were just about to enter the Gobi desert : EODB + EDC (Electronic Diesel Control). The truck switched to limp mode (I.e. you have no more power). After giving it many attempts to repair locally, we had no other choice than driving 1800 km into Russia to reach an Iveco garage as there is none in Mongolia. So, this address might be useful for Iveco owners in the area at large.

name: Epwob
description:
A good restaurant with friendly staff. Overnight parking behind the restaurant at no extra charge.
It was noisy with other trucks pulling in during the night but not terrible. 
Good for a one night stop.

name: Roadside
description: Take the small dirty track at south.. Many possibilities for the night or stop to eat.  Trees and small lake.

name: Top of Hill
description:
Next to a mobile phone antenna. Road still a bit noisy but good for a night. Not visible at all.
Track might require 4x4, depending on the weather situation. At least high clearance is required.

name: Mir Saun Hotel
description: Nice little hotel in a quiet area. Very clean and nice rooms, has also an (expensive) restaurant. We were searching in the dark for a hotel when a nice lady ask us if she could help us. She showed us this hotel. You would not expect such nice rooms. We payed 2000 (3000 on September 7th) for a double room, small but beautiful. Bigger rooms available. The parking is in front in a quiet area, camera controlled. There is also sauna with separate prices - see below.

name: SuzdalDa Hostel
description:
nice house hostel .
500 rubles shared room 4 bed. 
warm inside.
and kitchen.

name: Potboria Hostel
description: Very nice cottage 800 Rubles pp. No breakfast garage inside, toilet and shower outside bedroom.

name: Buzz a Cafe
description: Good food in this local cafe next to lake. Owner speaks only Russian.

name: Away from highway
description: Quiet spot in a field, some kilometres off the highway. Quiet spot, even though a sideboard is running by not too far away. Also closer to the river might be possible but muddy when we were there.

name: Caf√© Baykal
description: Excellent place to get some food at good price.

name: Verna hotel
description:
super capsule hotel 
10‚Ç¨-720 rubles single beds, clean, comfortable !!
downstairs is a coffee place And breakfast for 280 rubles 
safe private parking !!!

name: Tourist Hotel
description: Hotel with garage for motorcycles and cars/jeeps. Only english speaking lady at the reception. If you wanna make a stop here, there‚Äôs not much choice. A double room, simple but clean for 2300, garage for motorcycle for 100. There‚Äôs a kitchen you can use.

name: Luna Hostel
description: Good place to stay. Close to pedestrian street. You can park your motorcycle in front of the hostel, not safe as closed gate but hide from the road and camera on it. Dorm p/n 1000 RUB. Staff really friendly and helpfully.

name: Lakeside
description: Though it is close to town Zarechnyy, this spot is pure nature. There is plenty of space to pitch a tent or park a vehicle. All green, lots of wood for fire, access to water (not sure if drinkable, but clean), pretty quiet place but some locals come at times. We found some mushrooms, lots of raspberries and black current. Megafon 3G connection. We found this place by accident because another spot on iOverlander in this town was not accessible by big vehicle. Better access from a paved road that leads to the river. 4x4 not needed if it‚Äôs not raining, but be aware of tricky tree roots. Overall amazing place to camp before entering Ekaterinburg.

name: Parking Lot
description: It‚Äôs just a yard. free parking (‚Äúdvor‚Äù in Russian) behind a residential building. Very quiet at night, supermarket close, bushes, plenty of place. Right in the center of the city, where Pokrovka street starts. Nobody bothered us in our motorhome, but obviously it‚Äôs not a place to pitch a tent. –ê nice option to spend the night before exploring the city.

name: Punk commune
description: It‚Äôs a house for couchsurfers and hitchhikers.  There is a commune of punks/theatre people/musicians that accepts good people for free. Looks sketchy, but it‚Äôs safe and trustworthy (we came at night and they hosted us though we only said we knew this place from some hitchhikers that rode with us). You can park near the house or pitch a tent near or sleep for free in the house, use toilet and cold shower. They are 420 friendly and play guitar a lot, there are cats and a dog. 3G works great. Tell them you heard of this place from hitchhikers in Russia.

name: Kirmes f√ºr Kinder und gut Essen
description:
By accident, I discovered this great fairground. Various rides and music is offered. And you can eat pretty well here. Parking in front of it and free. I'm here without children and it was great. Relaxing.



Per Zufall entdeckte ich diesen tollen Kirmesplatz. Diverse Fahrgesch√§fte und Musik wird geboten. Und man kann ganz gut essen hier.
Parkplatz direkt davor und kostenlos.
Ich bin ohne Kinder hier und es war toll. Entspannend.

name: Arcadia
description:
Good hotel in Chita. 2,450 per one person economy room bathroom and shower separated from bedroom includes breakfast. They have parking. You can reserve also by booking and have a Cafe inside the hotel.

Update: we payed 3710 for 2 person in the Junior Suite with excellent breakfast.

name: Forest
description: Nice spot with a beautiful view for a night. Not too far from the highway but quiet. Clean spot.

name: Lake Pic nic
description:
Nice place near beautiful and clean lake. 
Local pic nic area but in this Moment is quiet. 
Clean and dire Wood place.

name: camp near military cementary
description: We stayed here to visit the Rossoshka military cementary next day. At this time grass was cut. Nobody around.

name: Lake side camping
description: Plenty of possibilities. Wind shelter under the trees. You swim in salty mineral water. Some locals cover their bodies with the black mud. Access is bumpy but no 4x4 needed.

name: Hotel Central
description: Nice hotel. Cheapest room 1500. 2 twin beds, en-suite, breakfast included. Parking 160 (motorcycle, don‚Äôt know if cars cost more). In front of hotel but guard on site. Beer shop across the street.

name: Good enough for a night
description:
Not a fantastic spot but we had difficulties to find a great one after a couple of days with rain. This one is okay for a night, flat ground and quiet at night.
Would not come here necessarily in dry conditions but when all is muddy, why not.

name: motorcycle mechanic
description: Alexander has an enduro workshop and is able to fix many faults on adventure motorcycles. he has some parts available and if he doesn't he knows where to get them.

name: Chechnia Cafe Home food
description: Here you can try real home made traditional Chechen food. Made with heart. Very tasty and prices are good. Around 120-150 rub. 1 position of meal. Chinkali, manty, pielmieni, lagman, delicious! The owner of the place Madina is very kind and nice person.

name: Nice wild camping
description:
Nice wild camping in the front of the river and amazing view.
For 1 night is super.

name: Podorozhnik
description: Basic hostel 800 per one person. Toilet outside, shower 300 extras. Next a cafe with good food but no WiFi.

name: Shower
description: There's a cafe and a motel on the side of the road. You can also take shower, 120 rubels per person, not very good conditions but clean enough and working. The lady at the cafe is very nice and friendly.

name: Gostinnyy Dvorik
description: Good place to stay 1,050 Rub in dormitory includes hot shower, shared toilet but no WiFi.

name: Old Quarry
description: Nice red quarry at the top of a track. Going West take a left on the mapped track to the top of the hill then a second left after the brow of the 2nd hill. Flat space for vehicles and tents. No 4x4 needed (& it was wet!)

name: River Tent Camp
description: Nice spot for camping. River 10 m. Easy access from road

name: Schoping Wash
description: Laundry. There are parking spaces in front of the center. --- W√§scherei. direkt vor dem center sind Parkpl√§tze.

name: Rasul hotel
description: Stayed here because reviews are really good. BUT it is not true. Worst place on our whole trip üò≠. Don‚Äôt go. You regret it!

name: Small Parking Place
description:
Small place, but very convenient to spend the night there.
Opposite there is a beautiful park with mineral water sources. 
Very safe.

name: place under trees
description: quiet and peaceful Palace under trees. Bad road.

name: next to river
description: there are a lot of places to stay next to the river. big rigs would fit here. there were some fishermen but very quiet at night. beeline + mts have h+ . be careful after rain, the last km is unpaved and can get muddy.

name: U Ozera - cafe
description: Lovely little restaurant on the side of a nice pond with amenities to chill and relax. Good cheap food, showers and toilet. Ok for camping but a little too close to the main road. Nice stop nevertheless

name: Parking
description: A good place for take a rest and sleep at night. There is a big place for parking, many shops, cafe, safe.

name: Sosnovyy Bor
description:
Big Camping site. Still in working process.
Camping is 500‚ÇΩ. There is water access, shower and toilets.
There is also a sandy beach, to swim in the River.

name: Village Green
description: Huge open flat green grassy land. Feels like you‚Äôre staying on a village cricket pitch, some shelter if you drive further behind the trees. Quiet, not disturbed, excellent LTE signal. Easily reached by any car!

name: KYB Service
description: Great suspension specialist. Took us not only to the cash point but Metro cash and carry for food. Very knowledgeable staff who found us equivalent parts for our Malaysian Mongol Rally car. They have sofas and toilets for while you wait for their epic service!

name: Umkhey hot springs and lake
description: Beautiful area with lots of different hot pools and even a small hot lake. Cabins around which you can rent, fireplaces, showers, toilets etc. Very relaxed kind of natural "spa resort". we used the hot pools and the lake for free, I think you only have to pay if you stay over night.

name: Elysun-Suvo-Barguzin Scenic drive
description: South of Elysun you can take the road east over the barguzin river and from there via suvo back to barguzin village (or vice versa). You have a beautiful view of the mountains and some nice rock formations on the way. road is not as good as the main road but still very doable.

name: Great Baikal trail & Viewpoint
description: From here you can hike  a part of the great Baikal trail up the mountains. the whole track is 2 days, but if you only go to the top and back it's doable in one day. On half way to the top there is also a viewpoint. There are places for camping and pit toilets around. very nice views with good weather!

name: Motogarage Raider 25
description: Great work for motorcycles, changed my rear tire there. Friendy english speaking owner and staff. Has Motul oil.

name: MAZS
description: Car LPG. Price 25 RUR. One of rate LPG stations in the area.

name: Home sweet home
description: So if you are a traveller with a van/tent/hitchhiker, welcome to St.Petersburg. At this location you can park for free or camp in a nearby huge forest. You can also use bathroom/shower/kitchen at my apartment if you need, just contact me on watsapp +79216562376 and if I‚Äôm in town, I‚Äôll host you or help you out with whatever you need. People helped me out so much while I travelled so I decided to put my apartment on the map. I know it‚Äôs hard to find a decent place to stay in a big city. Seriously, just message me. Cheers to all the free minded!

name: Cosaken Don
description: This was a camping ground before. You can park for free in front of the Building. Access to the beach is 150‚ÇΩ. Nice Restaurant with fresh fisch.

name: Mt. Elbrus view
description: Nice view  to Mount Elbrus. The spot is next to an russian astronomical site with large telescopes.

name: In the Trees
description: Nice spot just outside Omsk. Just turn off the main road at the crossroad sign. Grass, not much mud. A lot of places you can choose. If you drive to the other side of the trees, there is no trash.

name: Auto gas filling
description: Car LPG station. Open from 8.00 - 12.00 and from 13.00 - 17.00. Current price 28 RUR.

name: Nice place near the lake
description: The coordinates are for turn-off from the main road. Then you can follow the road till you find the best place to stay. Very calm place when we were there. Maybe in summer can be more busy. Few fire places around, possibility to find wood. It is also possible to park under the trees.

name: –ú–æ—Ç–æ –ê–≤–∞–Ω–≥–∞—Ä–¥ / Moto Avangard  - small motorbike garage
description:
Small repair shop next to gas station and car repair. Entrance is the right door under the white sign.

Young friendly man who speaks good English. Did my oil change (engine and gearbox) and adjustment of valve clearance here.

Big spare parts store is not far away.

Ask for Roman, Moto Avangard:
566616
or
89244584512

name: By the river Kama
description: Nice spot by the river. Just bellow the village. Some locals fishing. Quiet at night. No mosquitoes at this time of year.

name: –ó–∞ —Ä—É–ª—ë–º/ Sa rulom  -  store for car spare parts
description: Store for car spare parts and gardening. Bought engine and gearbox oil here.

name: Perekrestok truck stop
description: Trucker 24h stop. Free & clean toilets. Very good shower (150 rubel), seems to be quite newly built inside. Stay overnight for 50 rubel. Restaurant available. Directly at the road, so noisy at the night just as all truckstops.

name: Forest by the lake
description:
Quiet forest spot by lake and river. Beautiful surroundings even you can hear the road noise from time to time. 
Trees for hammock, so you can stay easily a bit longer. üòâ
No mobile phone reception.

name: Black Shaman Falls
description: About 5km walking distance from Black Shaman Falls. Quiet spot in the forest close to a creek. Beautiful spot but 4x4 recommended or at least high-clearance.

name: At the ocean
description:
Beautiful and quiet spot by the ocean. Might get crowded on the weekends or during holidays but we were alone.
When wet it might be tricky without 4x4 but usually should be okay.

name: Insurance
description:
No (moto) insurance available in Tashanka. Eventually found some here in Kosh Agach.

2814 rubles for 1 month; 3326 rubles for 2 months

Cash only

9am to ~7pm

name: gosti 24 chasa
description: the mini hotel is located in the village of Kurya at the address: ulitsa Sovetskaya, 49A.Offer to stay 1-2-3 bed rooms.

name: Atej Restaurant
description:
Nice restaurant with delicious food to moderate prices. English spoken, bottled beer, Schaschlik, piroges etc. 
Overnight parking possible on request, toilets usage possible, security guard from 11 p.m. on present, fast WiFi available, no pw needed

name: Kemping Pansionat Yubileynyy
description:
Big camping area. With hot shower and proper toilets. Access to the beach 50m, sea 150m.
Trees and some sitting places.
Cost 200‚ÇΩ per person and 200‚ÇΩ for Camper. Walking distance to all shops 300-800m.
Perfect place to swim, shop und rest.

name: Water house
description: Drinking water in small water house. We payed 80 rub for 20 liters.

name: Cabins and Campground
description: Nice place to stay. Cabin costs 1.200R for two persons. Toilet and Shower are clean. You have acces to swim in the lake or their pool and they have a restaurant.

name: Insurance for Russia and Kasachstan, looks official
description: Insurance for Russia and Kasachstan available. It seems more like an official place than the ones directly after the border. 2 months for motorycle 2000R. 15 days would have been 1000R.

name: Hotel Guris
description: Very clean and nice place to stay. Seems pretty new. 1500 R with bathroom in private doubleroom, 1100 with shared bathroom. Save parking and close to bus station.

name: Fields
description: Perfect spot for a night. It‚Äôs relatively close to the highway but calm and in the middle of nature. There are trees in case you are looking for shade. Accessible by all kind of vehicles via dirtroad (partly a bit bumpy but overall good to drive). Possibility to make a campfire. There were a few cars passing. We had a quiet night.

name: Steppes
description: Calm spot for a night before border crossing. No cars passing by. Good for one night. LTE with MTS. 3G with beeline.

name: Forest
description: Nice forest spot, away from road. Bit tight for big rigs but for a Landcruiser just ideal.

name: Riverside
description: Amazingly beautiful spot by a small river. Nobody around, just you, the river and the forest.

name: Pomponchik cafe
description:
Super place for rest and spend the night there.
The cafe with Russian food is working 24 hours!

name: Parking place
description:
Good to stop here and have a rest going from Moscow to St. Petersburg.
There is a huge parking place with guard and cafe , open 24 hours.
We paid 200 rub. for the night for parking.

name: Not too far from Vladivostok
description: Quiet spot, next to a side road, about 75 kilometres from Vladivostok. Good for an overnight stop prior heading to the city.

name: Gazovaya zapravka
description: Propane and LPG station in Khabarovsk. Current price is 25 RUR.

name: Car insurance next to the border (first container on the left after exiting?
description:
Car insurance in a container directly on the left after exiting the border. I was helped by a lady that knew what to do and spoke some English. Everything was arranged in 5 minutes.
1900 rubel for 15 days for a jeep wrangler. They allowed me to pay in Dollar and were willing to pay the change back un Rubel at the exchange rate of the day (on internet). They also sell sim cards.

name: Tikhy Dvorik
description: Seems not new but room is really new. Simple for 1350 RUB. Parking closed but not hide from outside, camera. Bar/restaurant with reasonable price. Cheapest a found before enter to Estonia. Cash or card. Big rig ok

name: By a small river
description: Nice little spot by a small river. Next to a dam. Quiet. Some locals fishing on the other side. In the village is a small grocery shop. Big rigs can find a spot up beside the lake.

name: Hi Loft Hostel
description:
Brand-new hostel with clean and nice interior. Fully equipped kitchen, washing mashine, wifi and several places to sit. We looked for a hostel with private parking and found this one. They agreed that we could sleep in the van in backyard and use the facilities. We paid 500 rubel for 2 persons. Staff is friendly and helpful. Parking entrance is via a backstreet, entrance is 3 m wide - can be little bit limited for bigger trucks.
Supermarkt, restaurant close by.

name: Hotel Ika
description: very nice hotel, near a lake. Clean, good price (1200 double room), safe parking.

name: Beautiful campspot at lake Chebarkul
description:
Very nice and calm campspot with beautiful sunset views.
Easy to find, good access also for bigger rigs and several flat spots with hardly any trash! 
MTC with LTE

name: Cheap Roadside Insurance
description:
Auto:
RUB1400 15 days
RUB2400 30 days

Moto: 
RUB800 15 days

name: AGZS
description: LPG car station. Open from 8.00 to 20.00. Current price 29 RUR.

name: Nice quiet hidden
description:
Nice and quiet place not too far from the main road. Hidden spot. Easy to find.
Good for a night. Very easy access. Might be a little muddy in case of rain.

name: next to birk woods
description: just off the ring road around the city, good place for an overnight stop. 4g beeline

name: on the way to Ukraine
description: good easy spot to spend the night, hidden by trees but close to graveyard. probably more spots down the gravel road.

name: Povkrovka 6
description: 3 star hotel, no breakfast, no restaurant, nice and clean rooms and staff. Closed parking free of charge in 5 minutes walking distance, big enough for all kind of "land cruiser size", no height limit. Very central place to visit Moscow for multiple days. Check booking.com and - as usual in Russia - cancel booking on arrival and get discount at the reception.

name: Restaurant and Hotel
description: Good and cheap food, double room with shared bathroom is 1000. The rooms are small and simple but clean. Sanitaries are fine. They have a secured parking, where we paid 50R per motorcycle.

name: Quiet and nice and hidden. Close to the mainroad.
description:
Nice spot for a night. Out of sight‚Ä¶
Easy access. No one here.

name: Truck stop
description: Truck stop with Wc (10 rubles) and shower (100 rubles). Has a shop and restaurant. We stop with our small van in front of the building. A bit noisy from the road. Lots of mosquitos.

name: Campsite near a pebble beach
description: Is a pebble beach with a big parking and a place to put tents with some huts as it side. Depending on the day can get crowded and during the night there are fishermen. We paid 150 rubles to enter (2 people) and stayed 3 days. There's a gate at the entrance. To arrive there's a small road near the ocean park.

name: Zolotoy Apartments
description:
Nice and clean apartments with own kitchen and washing machine. Private parking available as well. We cleaned out car interior there as we prepared for shipping.
Very friendly owner, bit English is spoken but they always found somebody to translate if needed.
We paid 3000R per night here.

name: Big Official Toyota Center
description: Very professional service and super friendly staff. Had a problem with the cooling system and they fixed it very fast. Half day of work plus cooling liquid ~150$. Some of them speak good english.

name: No international border crossing!!!
description: There is no border crossing for foreigners between Belarus and Russia. Either you enter Russia from EU(Latvia) or down in the south where Belarus, Ukraine and Russia meet at the same place. We(Germans) had Visa for both Belarus and Russia and tried at different border crossings to Russia, but they all rejected us, so we had to go back and enter Russia from Latvia.

name: Water
description: Water pump next to the street.

name: Pauwel Kwak
description: Belgian restaurant with an impressive selection of beers. The food and service is great too.

name: Lukoil before/after border
description: A decent gasstation after or before the Mongolian border. Mastercard and Visa accepted.

name: At the edge of the woods
description: Amazing place to wild camp. It is a little close to the road but you‚Äôre out of sight and the noise isn‚Äôt disturbing at all.
