You‚Äôll need a 4WD car, because when you turn off the road, it will get bumpy immediately. If you follow the tracks down to the river, you‚Äôll find several good spots. It‚Äôs a very nice spot to make a camp fire, especially if you cross the little river on the right and walk into the woods. A lot of camp spots around weren‚Äôt actually for free (they ask 150-400R) but this one doesn‚Äôt seem to be private property, so go ahead and enjoy!

name: Coffee & Beer Brewery
description: Nice place with good coffee and large craft beer selection. Friendly staff, some English is spoken.

name: FazerClub Motoservice
description: A motorcycle workshop - they primarily work with Fazers but can fix other brands too, or suggest someone who can. Honest and reliable, will go out of their way to help. You need to call for appointment (+79035559933). You can mention Alexey who is traveling to Sydney has sent you.

name: Hotel Dubrava
description:
Wonderful place to stay and relax. You can see the Volga river from your room and the beautiful garden. You can also walk to the river and swim there. Price is 1.700R for a double, breakfast (coffee and pancakes) incl. 
We loved this place! You can also just drink a coffee or eat if you don't want to stay overnight. The staff is very friendly.

name: Close to Ukraine border
description:
Quiet and peaceful place at a small lake for border crossing days. 
Easy access If dry.

name: –ö–∏–ø—è—Ç–æ–∫—å / Kipyatok
description:
Nice Russian restaurant in old style. Great relaxing atmosphere with old music playing in the background. Friendly waiters, who speak English and a menu in English. And last but not least: Great Food!

Not the cheapest place though. Main dishes vary from 400 to 800 Rubels. But in my opinion totally worth the price!

name: Drinking water
description: At this place you can get drinking water for 20 Rubel no matter how many liters you take. Ask at the reception (store) for drinking water.

name: Cliffs over Vladimir Bay
description: Beautiful spot above the cliffs. Nice views over the area and even nicer hikes at the beach or on top of the cliffs to the lighthouse. Not much protection from wind but when we were there it wasn't windy at all. Other spots around when you follow the track up the hill. Last 300m very bumpy track which needs some ground clearance. 4G MTS, H+ Beeline Great spot to relax some days after the long drive from Baikal!

name: Big gravel area next to road
description: Easy to reach and plenty of space for all sizes of vehicles. Seems like they used this place to dump what was left from road construction. Some rubbish in a corner but the area is huge and you find some good spots. Good for a stop along the way, no cellphone signal.

name: Truck stop
description: On the main road, bit noisy from the street but behind the building you will find a quite place. Parking for free, good for a quick night.

name: Fancy Sowjet Museeum
description:
Found this "museum" on maps.me.
Very familiar, little chaotic, bit expensive (300r p. P) BUT you can wear, taste and feel everything you see. So i you want, put a sowjet uniform, sit on sowjet motorbikes and look how the life was during sowjet area (dont forget to go downstairs) üòé

name: Big parkinglot by botanical garden
description:
We slept two nights here, crowded on weekends, but in the evening quiet. Good for a walk, just follow the trails on maps.me
Also wifi aviable in the front grey big building.
Very clean area.

name: Water Pump
description: old waterpump next to the road. we put some disinfectant, but it's probably drinkable without.

name: DoBeDo Hostel
description:
Nice hostel/hotel. We paid 300 rub per night for two people sleeping in our van in the parking area (narrow yard, not suitable for big rigs, some low branches, but we had no problems with our van that is 2,90 m high). Parking area could be busy, it‚Äôs also the parking for other apartments and a small clinic.
Toilet, shower and washing machine available. Small cafe inside.

name: 3–∞—Ä—è.  hotel
description:
just the unique hotel in the village 
little bit expensive but good room . clean and kitchen 
big parking 
safe

name: Vietnam Restaurant
description: Very beautiful restaurant, perfect mix between modern and traditional stile. Fair prices, super good food and friendly staff.

name: shinomontazh
description: they welded our broken  imperial, and cleaned our car.

name: altay mountains tea
description:
Very beautifull place where you can sleep in a yurt with other quests. Very friendly owner. He doesn't speak english but with google translate you can communicate. They offer free tea and you can chill out in the yurt. You can also use the kitchen in the yurt. They have also a very nice sauna. 

You will share the place with other guests. Sleeping in the car or tent is for free! If you want to sleep in the yurt it cost 10 euro. You can use the sauna for 12 euro for one our with max. six people. 

The road is okay for al cars but dirt road and one old brige. 
Pets not allowed in the yurt.

name: Very convenient truck stop in the way to Vladivostok
description: Good and nice restaurant. Good food. Prices are good. Sleeping in your van is no problem. One of the best truck stops on the way

name: Edelveis Guesthouse - don‚Äôt go
description: Looks nice From outside but owner is a real ******! Amazing how people can be soooo unfriendly and mean. Wonder how this place survives. Tells you different price when you pay / leave then on arrival, charges you for parking etc. Other guests via booking he didn‚Äôt even let into the gate. Crazy experience.

name: Toyota center Tchita
description: The classical professional Toyota center. Perfect and friendly service. Some guys speak English.

name: water pump
description: water pump next to street. water tasted drinkable.

name: by the lake
description: A place where we slept before crossing the border.  Located on the shores of the lake.  There are fishermen by day and nobody by night.  No facilities.

name: View point
description: Nice view over the Baikal lake in Listvyanka. Free.

name: TIR Parking, Hotel, Restaurant, Shower
description: We slept here leaving Ekaterinenburg, 100 Rubles per night for one car, guarded parking, showers 150 Rubles.

name: Hotel Europe
description:
very nice hotel 
big rooms 
big safe gated parking 
included breakfast ( it's nice breakfast ) 
good WiFi 
2400 rubles per night

name: Well off the road
description: Wonderful and quiet place behind the hedge of trees and next to an open field. Great sunset place. We stayed for 2 nights and haven‚Äôt seen a single soul. Road noise in far distance.

name: P 256
description:
gas station and gas bottle replacement.
 it is not possible to fill the cylinder
only,gas bottle replacement.

name: Lunch Motel
description:
very nice motel 
like new 
big parking outside but I was keep my motorbike inside of the door no problem 
good kitchen and shower

name: Fill up your drinking water here
description:
ice cold clear and clean drinking water.
Also locals filling up their water here =)

name: Bon Son Hostel -hotel
description:
nice hostel in the center !! 
just only parking motorbike inside and cars outside. 
good WiFi.
good shower. 
690 rubles 4 bed room.

name: water pump
description: water pump next to street, as you often find them in Russia.

name: small plateau overlooking the bay
description:
Small spot for maybe up to 4 vehicles.
Great view, not many people around (even on weekends) and almost no litter!!! No protection from the wind. track is a little bumpy, you need some ground clearance.

name: Makarov Hostel
description: Great central location, parking possible in front of the hostel entrance in a rather small side street, not for big rigs. During the week, the parking gets very busy. Security cameras outside. The hostel is ok, not the cleanest one though. We slept in our van and paid only for the toilet (20 rub) and showers (200 rub).

name: Sowjet Lifestyle Museum
description: Very funny museum about the life during sowjet area. Costs 250 Rubles p.p.

name: Near Markovo off A-119
description: Very nice campsite. Not yet finished cabins but allowed us to stay with our rooftop tent. Nice host. We didn‚Äôt have to pay to stay here. Host spoke English! Follow signs from main road that shows sign. Easy to find but 6km to drive as sign indicates.

name: In the woods
description: Several sites useable for all vehicles. No people around. Follow track past a few garbage dumps and you will find a spot.

name: Expensive Toll
description: When you continue to this Highway you need to pay 450 Rubles, dosen't matter if you go out after 5km, 450 Rubels is the minimum! Its the new Highway to St. Petersburg and it costs 2000 Rubles. We choose another Street to St. Petersburg

name: Road side cafe
description: Road side cafe, can park and sleep in the parking area. Cafe has showers (150p) and washing machine (150p) and toilets (20p)

name: Decathlon / Arena Mall
description: In this shopping mall is a big Decathlon

name: Baikal Traveler
description: Happened upon this place while visiting Lake Baikal from Ulan Ude. Very nice place owned by some friendly ladies‚Äînice, sizable rooms, cozy atmosphere, and not far from the lake. They made me dinner and breakfast, as well as gave me many blinis to take with me for the road. Welcoming place! They do have WiFi but it probably won‚Äôt work in your room. I can‚Äôt recall the exact price now, but it was in line for your average guesthouse in Russia. You can park behind a large gate in the courtyard.

name: Iveco garage in Novosibirsk
description: If you drive an Iveco it might be useful to know where the Iveco garage is located. Well, now you know.

name: Museum of military glory
description: WW II exhibition. Current price 200 RUR.

name: Free parking
description:
We slept here 8 nights for exploring St. Petersburg. Its very loud, yes, but this place offers some specials: free parking and Wifi, Toiletts (whit opening hours 09.00-21.00, 30 Rubles per use), waste bins, a little park and public transport is 10min away. Maxium height is 2.80m, cause you need to pass a bridge (see photo).
If you want to visit the city whit a guide we reccomand Anna (WhatsApp +7 921 754 36 19), she speaks german and russian.

name: VDV Military museum (airborne)
description: Military museum of Soviet and Russian airborne troops. Nice and friendly personel, part of text in English. Current price 150 RUR.

name: Chess city - museum in glass hall
description: We didn't find the city itself much interesting but in the main glass building there is little museum, visit for 50 rubels. Nice young guys talked us (in english) about kalmykian history, religion, symbols. You can try to resolve kamlykian puzzels and buy their special tea. It was very interesting.

name: gas tank
description: A station with a gas bottle filling point.

name: Hostel Centre
description: Great value for money, clean, comfortable, secure parking with remotely controlled gate (big space, any size vehicle shouldn‚Äôt be a problem) and right in the centre. Booked through booking.con for only $4 a night (275 rubles)

name: Parking place
description: Parking place, good for one night near border. We are here in november and its free, dont know how it is during high season.

name: Gas bottle
description: Filled up my European Propane gas bottle here. Enter via the car wash, go all the way to the back until you see gas bottles.

name: Hotel & Hostel Hutorok
description:
Hotel AND Hostel in one. Safe parking in the yard, everything very clean and staff very friendly. No English spoken, but receptionist knows some German.
They do register your passport with authorities for no extra fee (mandatory for traveling, even if all travelers say no one will ask for it).
Hostel is 500Rub with good breakfast included. See pictures for getting hungry :-)
Double room with private bathroom is 2000Rub half pension (!!!) included. Perfect when arriving late or when weather is too bad/cold to go outside. :-)
Location is behind the market, so everything you might need is around the corner. Big hostel kitchen to prepare the delicacies from the market :-)
We enjoyed our stay very much and highly recommend this place!
Big coaches/buses park in the yard, so big rigs should also fit :-)

name: Public water pump
description: Free water pump. Locals come here :-) Seems to work in winter...

name: Avtograd
description:
Big ‚Äûmall‚Äú with many shops for everything around vehicles: parts, accessories, lubricants, second hand parts, filters etc.
Shop Number 40 ‚ÄûWinCode‚Äú is extremely helpful. They speak some English, are specialized for japanese cars but happy to order parts for other brands. They ordered for us all filters, a thermostat, glow plugs and head light.
If parts come from wholesale, it takes 2 days, from Moscow 1-2 weeks.

name: –•–æ–∑—è–Ω–∏ / –ó–∞ –†—É–ª–µ–º ("Hosain / Sa Rulem‚Äú)
description:
Paradise!
3 storeys full of automotive and building (and outdoors) stuff :-)
We bought our Planar heater and all electrical parts, lubricants, filters etc. for our car there. 
If you ask, you get a discount paper for a garage they work with. We got 30% reduction on the workshop costs. A full day mounting our heater was 150‚Ç¨, warranty included for work and heater.
Adjacent huge tyre shop is the same company, same discount offer for partner garage. We bought our tyres there and got them mounted in their partner-workshop as well.
You get cables, fuses, switches, everything you need to fix problems on your car, HiFi, kitchen... :-)
Bring some time for great shopping fun :-)

name: Rossgostrash / –†–æ—Å–≥–æ—Å—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ö
description:
Please note that your ‚Äûgreen card‚Äú does NOT cover the asian part of Russia (and Turkey) and you need additional full insurance for Russia. Even if your insurance put the country code on the green card. Don‚Äôt believe me? Use google or ask at the backoffice of your insurance, the people in the callcenters don‚Äôt know...
We bought our russian insurance here. 2 months for a Volkswagen T4 van was around 65‚Ç¨.
You can pay by card, just the commission needs to be payed in cash. Not sure if everyone needs to pay commission, we were sent to this main office by a smaller branch, so maybe that‚Äôs why.
No English spoken, but if you use google translate, everything will be fine :-)

name: Shopping centre
description:
Huge Parking lot for a good nights rest. There is a very clean public toilette in the shopping centre and titan supermarket is nearby. 

Overnight stay at the weekend partly recommended, due to a nearby bar and locals doing donuts on the big parking lot with their cars appr. 100m away.

name: By the river
description:
Very quiet place next to the river and close to town.
Some people jogging and walking their dogs in the morning. 
Nice area for walking along the river.
Many options, one is directly at the beach, but as a snow storm was coming up, we decided not to risk not getting up the steep track the next morning. In summer no problem at all :-) 
Pitching a tent at the beach shouldn‚Äôt be a problem. At the sandy grass next to the road you will be seen.

name: M55 Motel / truck stop
description:
Big truckstop and parking lot with a motel. 
Right side are toilets, banya and shower for small money. Shower 350Rub, banya 600 Rub. 
The motel includes a small Cafe/Restaurant. Very good location to stay a night.
Overnight parking for free.

name: Lakeside
description: Sandy parking next to the lake near Izhveks. During daytime people come here to fish. Quiet during nighttime. Some noises of trains at the other side of the lake. No facilities.

name: Near Lake
description: Some people here during daytime spread over various cleared spots along the lake. quarry further down the parallel track, some tracks during day time. Quiet at night.

name: Diesel heater installation
description:
Installation of webasto and other diesel heaters.  very friendly staff. Located at the far left hand corner of the yard. 

See comments and pictures for more information!
They open at 9.

name: Altin Tuu Hostel
description:
Cheap Hostel. 500Rub/Person, parking in the yard.
We had a comfortable double room (1000Rub). There is a kitchen you can use and a very friendly owner, explaining everything about the region so that you want to stay longer :-)

name: Gostinitza Kolibri Guesthouse
description:
The cleanest room we had in months!!!
Double room with private bathroom 1200Rub
Breakfast and dinner in Stolobaya (Self-service restaurant) 50m to your left, Minimarket next door.
Parking in front and behind the guesthouse.
We enjoyed our stay very much!

name: Hotel Altai
description:
4-star luxury for the price of a simple guesthouse!
We paid 1600Rub for a 4-star room. Shared 4-Star bathroom with best showers we had in ages :-)
They also have rooms with private bathroom, if you need even more luxury than you already get without it. 
Breakfast is 400Rub extra, BUT in the self-service restaurant next door, it‚Äôs only 99Rub :-)
Parking right in front of the door.
Very friendly staff, they do your registration for no extra cost and without asking.
If you need to treat yourself with luxury, a good bed, a perfect shower and spotless clean everything, invest the 1600Rub :-)

name: Take southern route!
description:
There are 2 possibilities to go to the border/Barnaul:
a) northern route
b) southern route.

Take the northern route if you
- want to complain about bad roads
- want to feel the need for your expensive overlanding vehicle 
- trust your GPS more than locals (or me)
- love dirtroads
- want your vehicle to get the real adventurous look full of dirt

In any other cases, take the southern route. It‚Äôs paved, relaxed to drive, the main road where all locals, buses and trucks go and you‚Äòll pass some nice villages.
:-)
Your choice! Take a look at the picture and a map and decide :-)

name: Kostomarovo Orthodox Monastery
description:
Here is few cave churches inside limestone hill, some historical points, Orthodox women's monastery. You can find beautiful viewpoints, also monastery shop with souvenirs. In souvenir store you can buy a ticket for lunch (VEGETERIAN/VEGAN very simple, but big portion include soup, second dish, bread and drink) for 100 rubles p.p. (less than 2 u.s.d)
They have some dress code: pants (not short) for men and not short dress for women (and something for cover head). If you don't have long pants or dress, you can also ask cover stuff for visitors on the entrance (main gate). 
Monastery open from 8.30 a.m. till 5 p.m. Entrance for free.

Interesting and beautiful (and historical place). Nice people over there. Don't miss it :)

name: jeeptuning4x4
description:
Repairing 4x4 vehicle
Engine, Suspension, Welding, etc.
Very good Electric.
English spoken
Halpful with infomation about Baikal and Irkutsk
Tel.: +79025128506 (WhatsApp, Telegramm)

name: Anti Cafe Wooden Door
description:
Really cool little cafe. You pay 2 rubles or minute you are there but then coffee,tea and hot chocolate is free. even little cookiea are free. beer and cider is 200rubles per mug.
totally worth a visit. 
it is a little hard to find. find number 6 on the street, walk into the backyard and take the stairs to the basement. the is a sign on the door and is probably open even if it looks dark and closed.
free wifi and nice people.

name: Blagodat hotel
description: Family-owned hotel Russian style. Restaurants, camps are allowed.

name: Museum parking lot
description:
I was also allowed to stay in the parking lot over night. Dead end road with gravel parking lot between trees. Very peaceful. 

Highly recommended museum! If you are into old tanks, cars, military equipment and amphibious cars from Russia and the US - this is gold! Absolutely loved the gigantic Russian amphibious vehicles.

name: Sevkabel
description: Very nice spot to gang out! One of the few places where dogs are allowed in almost every restaurant there ;) Kind of Hipsterish place but good food and beer ;)

name: Gorchakovschinskii waterfall
description: The waterfall doesn't have any car park. You can park your car along the street.

name: Nice spot on a lakeshore
description: Place on the western side of the road, on the lakeshore. Could be windy.

name: Nice big sandy beach
description: Nice campground on a beach couple kilometres off Teriberka. Excellent view, soft sand, hiking to ocean view. 4G internet available.

name: Hotel Legion
description:
Best hotel ‚ÄúLegion‚Äù. Private suite. 
Cafe. Russian banya very good.

name: near the river Aldan
description: Camp. River aldan. I stay near the river Aldan in the tent. Safety.

name: Sahaheftegas
description: Fuel Stanton 92 95 diesel. Pay cash or card

name: Cuba hostel
description: Hostel for 4 sleep person. Near cafe Cuba. Safety

name: Gas station
description: Gas station. 92/95 petrol and disel. Pay only cash. 24h work

name: Hotel "”®–π“Ø–º“Ø"
description: Good hotel. Readable numbers. There is hot water toilet bath. Safely.

name: Hostel Floriya
description: Good hostel. Floriya. Handyga Energetikov str 14

name: at Selinger lake
description: nice spot. Only me and three tents on Saturday night. Fishing, swimming, hiking, some firewood.

name: Leisure center at the lake Torbeewo
description: There is a big leisure center with small beach. Camping spot is on the right side after the entrance. Nice little lake. Near the famous and well known monastery in Sergiev Posad.

name: Pool COBETSKIY
description:
Thermalbath, small shop, toilets, shower in thermalbath, restaurant in hotel, snackbar in thermalbath 
Pool COBETSKIY

name: Kaf√© Aida
description: Near road - typical ‚Äúkafe‚Äù restaurant in Russia. Tasty food, nice servise. You can stay here for night, dry toilet.

name: Sandy beach by the river and pine forest
description: In front of the village opposite the gas station turn to the left. When it rains,its difficult to drive. But its worth it. Travel to the beach 200rub from the car.

name: Under pine trees
description: Small area covered by pine trees along the road, easily accessible, no wind, lots of space, moderate garbage, no insects.

name: Dagestanskyje ogni beach
description: Nice beach, sandy, no wind, cleaned, locals come here to fish and swim but leave by night. The only problem might be the stone-pit nearby, but at night works stop. Road is little rocky.

name: Amazing view on Sulak canyon (the best one!!)
description: The view is breathtaking, the spot is advised by local guide. To get here turn on ‚Äúmoto‚Äù mode on maps.me otherwise it takes you on another road (through the village, but you should turn right before the village to get here). 4x4 only. Large space on the top.

name: The Ring Waterfall
description: Nice small waterfall, well-built path, easy access. Place to camp at the entrance, if you need a spot for a night. No cell coverage.

name: Big clean shower place!
description: Behind service area, unlimited use for only 100 rub! Call the number on the BAHR door if closed!

name: Kronshtadt sea view
description: A quiet place away from ring road with view on the harbor. No facilities, aware of sand.

name: Aga-Zaisan Ails
description: Authentic altay houses, name ‚ÄúAil‚Äù, for rent as hostel (5 prs in one house) with traditional banya (sauna) owned by nice native altay family. Big area for campingcars and tents. Fire possible. Close to river, some small sand-beaches, fishing.

name: Confluence of Biya and Katun
description: Confluence of Biya and Katun, beginning of the Ob River. nice place next to river, no problem with 4wd. many mosquitoes in the evening

name: new place with River
description: like place with river, no sattelit 103, beeline edge,

name: Spassk river front
description: Public beach with river view, easy to back in and no problems from locals to spend a night, especially when it's not the busy summer season. Lots of space for a big rig.

name: Oak forest
description: Nice and quiet place. Accessible for any vehicle including RV and trailers. Fee $4

name: Ostrog MotorcyclePost
description: BikePost, where you can stay and get help if you travel by motorcycle. Contant Svetlana +7 924 576-07-72

name: Campland
description: Nice camping in wonderful place. The road is bumpy with sharp stones, mud and tight turns. 4x4 only. No long rigs and RV. Small houses available for rent.

name: Quite place near oak lake
description: quite place, near the lake. good for one night, silent and safe.

name: Paradise Camping
description: Nice site right above the sea. 400 steps. Stairway to Heaven. If you know you know what I mean

name: wild camp next to Bira river
description:
This place is near Bira river. Although it is close to city of Birobidzhan and roads, not too noisy. You may have a bath in river, but be careful.
Saw some campfire spots, it seems local people come here for rest. luckily there was full moon, had a romantic night; didnt even need to use any light. 
good cellphone and internet coverage.

name: lake view wild camp
description: this is the beach on the west side of Arakhley lake. there are 7 lakes in this natural park which is a recreation place for people from city of Chita. Therefore I do not recommend to visit at weekends. good internet connection (MTS 4G)

name: lake view camp
description: On the shore of Sosnovoye lake. Not far from town of "Sosnovo Ozerskiy" but very quiet. fast internet (MTS 4 G). There are few good stores in town, you may get your basic needs, food etc.  In fuel station "rostneft" you may find cappuccino

name: public water pump
description: free public water pump. locals take water, dont think it is potable just for filling up your watertanks /canisters

name: Camp site "Myagnaya Karga"
description:
Campsite in the national park. Each campspot has fireplace and shelter with table,  surface is sand and flat.  There is a small kiosk/shop near administration. Toilets are on the other side of road . No water, no electricity. 500 rub/night. They provide wood for campfire for 150 rub. They have russian sauna on the beach, 150 rub/hr per person.  Weekends overcrowded by  locals.
Be carefull of bears. Some nights they visit garbage, and even campspots. I had a visitor. When she understood that I saw her she continued her way calmly. 
As a reminder,  at night do not leave any food outside, and do not walk in forest.

name: baikal view cafe
description: On top of the hill with great view of baikal lake, mys burkhan and shaman rock. free wifi. Good point to stop by

name: Volcano "Tal'skaya vershina"
description: unique oppƒ±rtunity to be inside an ex volcano. not far from main road.

name: guest house "Valna"
description:
I was tired after long driving in rainy and chilly weather, found here in booking.com on last minute. paid 2000rubles for 2 bed room. 
maybe not an overlanding style but very comfortable and clean. there is a inner yard surrounded by walls, parked my car 
owner is friendly. there is free wifi in hotel but didn't use. MTS 4G connection

name: cafe "Region 75"
description:
It is in the yard of cafe "region 75". They do not have advertisement about rooms, so you should ask. 700 Rub per person. 
There are only 3 rooms. Sink and cold water in room, toilet outside. Rooms clean, beds comfortable. Personnel were friendly 
There is fenced parking lot for max 4 cars next to rooms. 
Delicious food in cafe. No WiFi, only poor mobile internet

name: Masloff expres service
description:
Changed oil, filters and had diagnostic. Professional service and management. 
Actually, they are former Ford service in town. Now they give service to all kind of cars.
Chief mechanic Sergey was very helpfull and friendly. They even allow me to park my car in their fenced yard for night (free).

www.masloff-75.ru

name: HHK
description: If you are driving to Vanino to take the ferry to Sakhalin this is the last fuel station. next one is after 320 km in Vanino.

name: MTC mobile phone
description: MTC (red/white logo) simcards. All mobile network providers in Russia offer regional and ‚Äûall Russia‚Äú tariffs, so make sure you get the ‚Äûall Russia‚Äú option.

name: G Energy Service
description:
A father-son mechanic garage. Father speaks German, son English.
Very nice people, very good and clean equipment. They didn‚Äôt only fix the problem (oil pressure sensor broken), but also found the reason (and searched for it without telling them). 
They can also do oilchange (all on stock).
Construction market and supermarket close by so you can do your shopping while they work.

name: At the lake
description:
Beautiful lake close to downtown. Very quiet at night.
Some people running or cicling early in the morning, that‚Äôs it.

name: Diesel heater service
description:
Navi Grupp sells, repairs and services diesel heaters of several brands: Autoterm/Planar, Webasto, Ebersp√§cher.
They will solve your problem better than the ‚Äûsupport‚Äú in your home country. :-)

name: Grafit
description:
Nice and extremely helpful workshop. Cashier speaks English. They have free hot drinks, WiFi and comfortable sofas for you wait.
We turned up with a broken waterpump for the windscreen wipers and they replaced it quickly. If you come before 12:00, they can get all parts from several local dealers delivered and work done the same day.
Open 9-21 hr.

name: Restaurant, Banya, Diesel
description:
Kind of a truck stop with a cute restaurant, a banya and a diesel station. We spent a quiet night for free. 
There is a cat running around and jumping into your vehicle begging for food :-) 
Loved this place! 
Can be muddy after rain, so park on gravel (there is enough).

name: Wolga Parking in old town
description:
Quiet parking (music of the restaurant is turned off at night). 
Free of charge. Dustbins around.

name: Moskowskaya Zastava Hotel
description:
Nice Hotel at the Wolga in the Center with perfect parking. 
THEY DO YOUR REGISTRATION for your legal stay in Russia (you need to register within first 7 workdays in the country).
The cheapest room is 30‚Ç¨. Note that cheap guesthouses, private accommodation and hostels often refuse to register your visa.
You‚Äòll get a paper slip. Nobody wants to see that until something happens (accident etc.) and you get in touch with authorities for any reason. So be smart and invest 30‚Ç¨ for your legality. :-) We had an accident on prior travels in Russia so we made the experience how important that little paper is.
Comfortable beds, fast WiFi, good showers, private banya available (extra cost), breakfast is extra but there is a nice bakery in the arcades. Alternatively you can just book the room and do as if you would sleep there and stay in your vehicle at the parking. For those in fear of theft. üòÇ

name: Car parts market
description: Market in 4 halls with all kinds of spare parts and accessories.

name: Car Service Instrumentaliniy
description: Brilliant Mercedes, Land Rover, Land Cruiser etc mechanics & problem solvers. Best service & help I have ever, ever experienced: managed to replace the turbo, changed worn shocks & put on winter tires on my 2011 Defender in record time. Evgeny the owner speaks perfect English & runs well established & very fairly priced works: he went out of his way to find a solution. Top guy!!

name: Katun&Akem rivers
description: Katun and Akem rivers mix Good place wild camp,  good water, may be fishing,

name: Verkhnyaya (near Konosha)
description: Very nice place for 1 max 2 campers, near the lake with beautifull view and small path to swim in the lake. No facilities at all.

name: Litlle lake near Iglino
description:
Nice little lake with a very small beach. Locals come swimming and fishing. 
To find it go to these coordinates, follow the road straight for 150 m than turn right on a small dirt road. 50 m further you have the mini beach.

name: Red Moscow Hostel
description: Friendly staff, free closed parking, good free breakfast.

name: Gastina Dvor
description: Clean neat very comfortable hotel worth driving 40km to avoid overnight in Vanino if you taking the ferry to Sakhalin.

name: Under the Bridge
description: Nice space under a bridge, next to a river.

name: Nice spot Burdakovka
description:
Behind a small village, really quite, direct on the river.
Great spots for fishing.
Just some locals fishing all the time

name: Just another pump
description:
Drinkable water with good pressure.
Good parking cause of side street
People drink here as well

name: Truck Stop
description: We camped in the field next to the 24 hour truck stop. There were some dogs around but otherwise we weren't disturbed. Really good, clean bathroom at the truck stop that cost 150 Rubles for a nice hot shower. At the truck stop restaurant tea 35 Rubles, coffee 40 Rubles, sweet bun 40 Rubles, 500mL Beers 100 Rubles. Fine for a night.

name: Campsite
description: Quite, not wet and not so windy place close to main road for camping. Actually a gravel pit. Few hundred meters from here road to Dalniye Zelentsy can only be driven by 4x4. Rare cars from non-main road can be heard. Check the solidity of ground before driving there by car. River nearby. No mobile signal/internet available. Shop is 1 hour driving away in Tumaniy.

name: Gigit
description: Nice seasight, not much people. A little difficult road.

name: Near border
description:
Good motel before border (perfect for motorcycles). clean and good motel, 135 km before the border to Kazachstan. safe parking for motorcycles, cars, etc. 
The price was quite expensive, 30 euros for a 3 bedroom with shared bathroom and 50 for room with bathroom. in the end we got first one for 15 euros. it's really clean, the decor is a bit Russian (pink ceiling) but it's a good place, nice people around. they speak a bit English, enough to get around.

name: Kola Superdeep borehole
description: The deepest artificial point on Earth in the Arctic, Russian Far North in the borderzone with Norway. Drilling was performed from 1970 to 1994, and the place was abandoned in 2008. Some more info in a video: https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=1ZzfG0ZORLA

name: Shower and Toilet
description: Very clean and good showers and toilets at a sort of truck stop with other shops. 150 Rubles for a shower and 20 Rubles for the toilet.

name: Many different food vendors
description: Very popular stop for locals, we just had a coffee and it was expensive by Russian standards but very good, they even had almond milk. Worth a stop if you fancy something to eat or a hot drink.

name: Back Yard Hut
description: We went looking for "No Name Yet" but it was closed, while considering other places a lady came over  and told us she had accommodation and walked us to her house. The hut is lovely with a kitchen and 2 double beds, the fire went on when we arrived but during the night it got very cold, but they have great blankets. Lovely family and highly recommended.

name: Very nice hidden place with a view
description: Very nice and quiet place up in the mountains, sheltered between some trees. Nobody around, only a little house on the way up here but not in sight. You can get here with a 4x4 via a dirt road. Lovely view over the valley.

name: Auto Camping "Aurora" (New Place)
description: New autocamp Aurora. We payed 1700,- Rub. For our big rig including electricity.

name: Tourist market and trek to Sarlyk
description: a lot of small cafes with local food. you can buy honey and souvenirs. and here is starting trek to Sarlyk.

name: Best hostel
description: Cheap hostel in Grozny (507 rubles/night. 8 bunk beds in a room, only one toilet, two showers, but clean, with canteen downstairs and a free parking.

name: Tiere repair shop
description: super nice guy, super quick, appears to be competent in what he is doing. He fixed our valve issues quickly. Filled all our tires to te values I gave him. In the end it was not expensive at all!

name: U Rodnika
description: Nice little cafe with a very welcoming owner and delicious food

name: Ekranoplan
description:
The famous Ekranoplan "Lun" has been beached definitely here, and a visitor center (?) is being built, although it‚Äôs hard to tell when it‚Äôll be finished. 
Plenty of space around to sleep on the huge, empty beeches.
Maybe not worth a detour from the Tbilissi - Astrakhan route, but definitely not to miss if you visit Derbent.

name: Road closed.
description: Road up the village is now closed. Only local Jeeps are allowed to the second parking.

name: Cafe Ko√Øsu
description: Very interesting place, friendly owners, good cha√Ø and koffye.

name: secluded wild camp in the middle of farm lands
description:
we found this place when traveling from moskow to Kazachstan via Saratov. 
it's a patch of forest and a pond in the middle of farm lands. you can stay next to the pond or drive up a bit and find a nice secluded space where you're not visible for the road or the farm land. 

probably need a 4x4 when it's wet.

we stayed here with a four person tent and our car. but there is plenty of space for bigger vehicles.

name: Dagestan border
description: Checkpoint for crossing to Dagestan. really friendly officers. Driver has to go out and will be send to an office to register the vehicle.

name: hotel 26a
description: Cheap and clean hotel. We paid 750 roubles each for a night. There is also restaurant. Staff is friendly and helpful. Moreover, there is a small shop in the next building selling essential stuff (pasta, water, etc...). parking lot but it's not closed, wifi.

name: –ö–µ—Ä—É–µ–Ω
description: Possibility to rent a small wooden house or to camp. We paid 500 roubles for a night in our tent. There is a shared ger where you can cook, use water and eat (warm place). it's clean. The family is very nice and welcoming. The landscape around is very beautiful. Pit toilets as usual.

name: Bank for changing before Mongolia ?
description:
Sense Russia to Mongolia
We stopped in Tashanta with the thought that we could change RUB in MNT, and military told us that we had to turn around to Sberbank in Koch-Agatch. 
We didn't, but if we knew it before...

name: Kansk
description: Russian: –ö–∞–Ω—Å–∫. It is drinking water with a playground next to the Trans-Siberian Road. It's accessible and the water comes out well.

name: Near Resort
description: Pretty cool place, on (overgrown) cement slabs near the resort.  Level and very quiet overnight, some locals about on a quad bike in the evening.   Only stayed one night on our way to the Caspian.   May be difficult after the rain, probably  best for 4x4 or high ground clearance.

name: Car insurance
description: Left hand side, coming from the border. Cost for a normal car was 2500 Rubel for 15 days. English was spoken. Good experience.

name: Region 42
description: Nice little Restaurant close to the main road. It had a good selection of local food, wifi, clean and hot showers (150 rub per person), a banja and washing mashines. The staff was very friendly! They even let us fill our 100 L water tanks for free.

name: Region 42
description:
The Restaurant let us fill our 100 L water tank for free. Ask the shower lady.

Disclaimer: We took a shower (150rub per person) before asking for water. 
We also ate at the Restaurant afterwards, but this was no requirement for the shower or water.

name: Region 42
description:
Clean and hot showers next to restaurant for 150 rub per person.

I believe it is open 24h.

name: Region 42
description:
The Restaurant also offers washing machines. We haven't used them but since the showers and the food were good and cheap, I believe the laundry is also cheap. 
Ask the lady in the shower building.

name: Vladikavkaz with secure parking
description:
Nice 3* hotel with a huge and 24/7 secured inner courtyard parking. The GPS location is in on the middle of this parking.

Standard room for 2 ppl incl. breakfast was 6000 RUB, parking 100 RUB.

Nice walk over the bridge to the city centre with lots of restaurants.

name: Next to the border
description: On a "parking" near the border, good place to stay for a night just before or just after crossing the border.

name: Spring water
description: There is a source of drinking water. The water is fresh and very clean. There is no water tap. Provide a pump or fill bottles with water

name: large camp place near a river
description:
Very large camping area near the village and the river, quiet possibility of making a fire, accessible with any type of vehicle. 
Maybe another people during summer
Good internet 3G MTS

name: Russia Car insurance for Russia
description: Insurance office for russia with wifi access

name: Gostinitsa Karavan
description: Comfortable place to spend the night. Clean and modern place with airco and wifi, 1500/2500 Rb for room. Private parking is available behind a gate.

name: –ö–∞—Ñ–µ –¢–ï–†–ï–ö
description: Nice restaurant that offers local and western style food. Steaks, burger, pelmeni, soup, grilled fish, pizza, grilled veggies. Everything very fresh and delicious. Around 200 rb.

name: Quiet spot near the road
description: Not far from the road but quiet place. Near trees so pretty fresh place ! Locals come for picking wild strawberries, so good !!

name: Near highway, near a lake
description: Nice spot to have a break on the road. Wifi router needed to have connexion. Access perhaps too difficult for ground clearance too low...

name: near m5 and little river
description: Quiet spot near m5 hidden from houses near the river. good 4g

name: Nice place to sleep and Park with shadow
description: Closed to the water pump, there are some places under the trees. it is a perfect place for parking with shadow, calm and water.

name: Guarded parking to visit Moscow
description: 600m from Penyagino stop subway, open 24/24 for 500ru/day.

name: Little parking hidden close to highway
description: On the way Latvia Moscow, hidden by many trees, little parking place next to a little road going to few houses. We didn't see many people. Good 4G

name: Cheap parking behind petrol station
description: On the road to the border, for 150 r you can park here to spend the night.

name: Military / Police Checkpoint
description: Throughout the region we found many military and police checkpoints (6/7).  There are regular cars that make videos of you that they send to the police.  So they stop you and look for a reason to get money using these videos.  It happened to us, they asked us ‚Ç¨100 for overtaking behind a truck with a discontinuous strip.  We managed not to pay.  Warning, follow all the rules of the road and be prepared to haggle.  Good luck.

name: drinking water
description: water self serve station. 1.4p per liter

name: open parking close to city center
description: big parking lot. no ramp. no sign saying you cant camp so I think it's possible to stay overnight as well.

name: wild camp lake Stanovoe
description: A good place is the access to the water through the bushes of a few insects. fast internet

name: Parking Lot
description: It's a very big parking lot, next to a huge and beautiful park. 10 minutes walk from the metro station. It's free. We stayed here 3 nights and we were alone. This place is like a gift to visit Moscow.

name: wild camp just off M7
description:
when driving towards Moscow take exit called Skolepovo. it's just before a rest area. follow the track into the forest and you'll find many spots to camp if you don't mind camping in tall grass.

bit of noise from the M7 but not too bad. there's also an active quarry you'll probable want to keep a little bit of distance from. 

good enough place if you need an overnight stay before continuing to moscow. 

the track has some low hanging overhead branches so anything taller than a Landcruiser type vehicle with some load on the roof will not fit. 

high clearance vehicle is advisable.

name: Road closed for foreigners
description: We got stopped by the police, because this road is not open for foreigners. Foreigners are supposed to take "main roads" i.e. the western road through Alkhanchurt up North before they turn East towards Chechnya. Initial fine was 10.000 RUB but could negotiate down to 25.000.

name: Beach, Tsimlyansk reservoir
description: Wild beach, you can swim, mud bank , there is a connection, wind,

name: Veterinary (making health certificate)
description: Good veterinary. They are able to make health certificate to accross borders.

name: wild camping, view and tranquility
description:
Amazing camping spot place far from the village good 4G amazing view and accessible with a classic car (maybe not with a rain)
Stayed one day and I saw no one, spotless place!

name: flat parking near the road
description: flat parking spot beside the road. there is a cafe nearby. we stayed the night. quiet and other trailers were also parking for the night. nit the best internet coverage.

name: parkin spot for night stay beside the river
description: quiet place, flat, good for being a little bit away from the road. we had a calm night parking with our camper van.

name: Quiet, flat spot by river
description: We spent a great and very silent night here on our way from Georgia to Kazakhstan. We found a flat spot with some bushes around, but there are countless places in the area. There are many places from which you can exit the main road and reach this spot. Note that there were 4-5 fishermen on the southern side of the river when we woke up, but none on the northern side where we slept. And they were very friendly! It‚Äôs close to the main road, but far enough away that you won‚Äôt be seen by drivers on the road. Some mosquitoes so beware of that - there are probably fewer further away from the river.

name: Lesogorskaya Resort –õ–µ—Å–æ–≥–æ—Ä—Å–∫–∞—è
description:
Beautiful spot directly at the vuoksi river. 
It‚Äôs an old building but it has its charm.

name: lake camping  spot
description: flat spot at the end of a riad leading to lake. good cell coverage for internet. quiet place.

name: camp site
description: first the point is not exact. but you find it on the road to nature museum of khibi. its an established campground. the owner very friendly.

name: Dagestan, Caspian Sea, Beach spot
description: Very nice spot for being close to the Caspian Sea. It's a kind of wild camping without any services but you are not completely alone here. The Beach line is used by some other wild campers but not crowded at all. No shadow, no water, but away from the more resorted area.

name: camping place
description: nice spot, calm. suitable for any type of car.

name: water spring
description:
MODERATOR NOTE: Description does not state that water is potable. Use caution.

water hose. inside a small wooden shelter

name: beach side camping spot
description: in front of beach. ok for big campers. quiet. ok for one night stay

name: wild camping near a small river
description: A secluded place next to a small river. Clean flat spots in the grass under the trees. 4x4 is not needed. Many birds. Internet signal is weak. You can hear the noise of traffic, but there are not many cars on this section of the route. Shadow at morning until 10 a.m. There is also a caf√© in about 200 m distance

name: Bakhtemir
description: Quiet place by the river. Just follow the sand/gravel path to the right from the street. You can hear the main road a bit, but it is not disturbing. Vans are not visible from the main road. Not facilities.

name: parking spot near river
description: its a parking zone close to hotel and Arena. a flat spot. it also has electricity. good for camper cars.

name: water point
description: good water point with good pressure and you can adapt a pipe

name: free spot
description: all size. acces to the lake ok. lot of place

name: Insurance office
description:
Insurance office for Russian car insurance. The lady was friendly and helpful. No english spoken, but Google Translate made it work.

One month insurance for a van (Sprinter) was crazy expensive (about $70), maybe because it‚Äôs registered in the EU. Tried to negotiate but that was not possible. As we have multiple transits ahead we opted for 3 months of insurance, that costed about $100.

name: Simple spot between trees, hidden and shade
description:
Nothing spectacular, but as most spots in this area aren‚Äôt ideal we decided to add it anyways.

It‚Äôs not far from the main road, but if you park between the trees you‚Äôre not visible. The track to this place was good, not muddy like most others. If you want more privacy you can follow the track that leaves the main road further. We just slept here for a night. Some LTE.

name: Baden Baden
description: Pretty fancy & cheap dorm bed for 600 Rubles. It is a formal hotel with some dorm rooms on 4th floor. It was suppose to include breakfast but the day I checked in, I was told chef is on holiday. Nonetheless, 600 is a pretty good price for hotel like facilities

name: Hostel Volga
description: Cleanest hostel I stayed in. Bathrooms are as swanky as 5 star hotel. No airconditioning in hostel room. Booked for 485 Rubles a night at zenhotels.com. You can pay with foreign card

name: Eurasia Hostel
description: Large place with ample parking. Pretty clean. 500 Rubles for a bed in dorm. No kitchen but grocery store & Istanbul cafe nearby.

name: Hotel (thats what Yandex map said)
description: quoted 700 rubles but got it for 500. has a reasonably price restaurant with beer. Cleab toilet

name: Mikhail's Bike Post
description: Stay in a garage for 1-2 motorbikers. Hosted by Mikhail. No sanitation facility but Mikhail can provide some pointers. Reach Mikhail on Whatsapp at +7 904 305-92-87. Mikhail can speak some English

name: camping Volga side
description: it is possible to take a ferry to this coast, several options for established camping. wild camping is also possible. A large sandy beach nearby, a good place for swimming. strong internet signal. no shops

name: Hidden spot under trees
description: Found this little hidden spot under the trees next to a river, easily accessible (also by 2wd). Close enough to civilisation for great internet connection, far enough too be well hidden from other humans. River is difficult to acces. Some mosquitos like everywhere in this region at this time of year. Barely any trash.

name: Military Checkpoint
description: Quick car check and asked for weapons but very arrogant and unfriendly

name: Grassy area with trees along the river
description: Nice grassy area with room for many vehicles. Lots of trees around for shade and wind shelter, not visible from the road. River with fish that is also easily accessible to bathe or do dishes. Plenty of firewood around. Minimal mosquitos. We got here by crossing a shallow stream, probably doable in 2wd. But maybe you can get here via the bridge without having to cross the stream.

name: Last sheltered spot before the border
description:
This is basically the last sheltered spot before the border with Mongolia. You can camp on the open grassy spots along the water or a bit more in between the trees/shrubs. After here the landscape turns into steppe. Great spot along the river, very clear water and lots of fish. OK internet reception with Beeline. 

Spot is known by locals too but was calm during the night.

name: Campingplatz Am Katun
description:
Nice area with amazing views. you cannot camp here but you can rent a wooden house for 4 persons for 2600 rubli. 
There is internet connection, shower toilet, parking, kitchen and it is very clean.

name: Windshield repair
description: We had a small crack in our windshield. In the basement garage of the Pioneer mall is a guy who can fix it (Remont Dr. Triplex). It cost 500 Rubel and took 40 minutes.

name: Waterpump
description:
MODERATOR NOTE: User did not specify if water is potable. Use caution.

clean, cold water from a pump at the street corner

name: water well
description:
MODERATOR NOTE: User did not specify if water is potable. Use caution.

Water well next to the road with a pretty blue panelling around

name: Forbidden Road
description:
We left the highway at this junction (coming from Grosny and wanted to go to the Georgian border). We entered this road over Nesterowskaja/ Alkhasty. It seemed like a normal paved road, there wasn‚Äôt a clear sign that it is forbidden for foreigners to enter. 

After about ~15 kilometers a checkpoint showed up. We got interrogated and checked (car, phones, personal information etc.) for over 4 hours. Wasn‚Äôt a nice experience at all. 


Do not enter this road!

name: Currency exchange (Rosbank)
description: Here we changed US dollars and euro to rubles. Unfortunately, they did not take Kazakh tenge. The rate was not bad. The bank is open on weekends, but they only change money on weekdays.

name: Money exchange (VTB Bank)
description:
Moderator note: Duplicate

Here we changed US dollars in euro to rubles. Unfortunately, they did not take Kazakh tenge. Open on weekends, we changed money on a Saturday afternoon. The rate was okay.

name: E40 - Truck Stop
description: It‚Äôs a truck stop, where you can have shower, fill your water and park for the night. You could sleep here as well

name: By the river, away from road
description: Nice little spot next to a smaller road, away from the main road. Good for one night on the way to/from Mongolia. It is quiet at night, the river masks the already low noise from the sparse traffic on the road. Only room for one car/van. You can see the path to get here on Google Maps satellite. It‚Äôs short and steep from one side, better from the other. No internet (edge) with Beeline. There‚Äôs some trash around, looks like locals use it sometimes. When we left, we saw a nice spot on the other side of the river where we believe you can camp as well, and that one is even more hidden behind trees. It‚Äôs at: 51.516938, 85.573763

name: Tatyana Sergeevna/ –¢–∞—Ç—å—è–Ω–∞ –°–µ—Ä–≥–µ–µ–≤–Ω–∞
description:
Recreation center Spring of Good Luck. Accommodation from May to October. Comfortable and non-comfortable rooms, barbecue, sauna, swimming pool.

name: tire repair (vulcanization)
description: It is possible to repair heavy goods vehicle tires.  I repaired an xzl tire torn on the side for only 50 euros

name: auto parts store
description: it is possible to buy any automobile part in this store

name: DIY store
description: DIY store, there is a lot of hardware, tools, etc.

name: Aleysk
description: Buffet restaurant. some local people told us to come here and it was a very good place, cheap and cosy.

name: Great spot next to river
description: Fairly flat spot next to river. Below road - traffic noise was basically zero with the river as noise cancelling. Big area. Big rig friendly. Might be bothersome for two 2wd if it rains. Can pitch a tent if you like.

name: Quiet Overnight spot near the River
description: we stopped here for one night during our transit. It has even ground, is easily accessible (even with 2WD) and quiet. First you have to drive by a tourist camp, but there was nobody. on the lower platform you can park behind the big rock. There are even firepits, but nobody was around when we have been here.

name: Fresh water
description: Clean tap water in the center of town.  Water pressure is good.

name: wild camp near the river
description: very nice place near the highway. it is hidden by the main road and you have a great view of the river. quite place, just some local fishermen.

name: Bursal ‚ÄúPink‚Äù Lake
description: Parked in parking area. Rig is too big to go on the salt beach. Being September, nobody‚Äôs around. Just salt harvesters. On the edge of town. Great view of lake and train‚Äôs entrance into the lake

name: POCROCCTPAX
description:
After entering Mongolia, all insurance companies were closed. After four days finally this company can help us, but needs to buy one year. We don't have no any other options.
Office on 3/F

name: Quiet spot in the woods
description: Very quiet spot for the evening about a 100 meters from the road. Spot for two big rigs. You can go deeper but for us it was fine.

name: Wakesurf Park Camping
description: Established camp with space for +- 10 big rigs. River beach, volleyball and Wakesurf pub. 1000r p/n per camper. (2 people). Chalets too rent as well.

name: Roadside. A-370
description: Tap water next to the highway.  It's clean and the water pressure is good.

name: Alexander Pond
description: A beautiful place to stop with a tent. You can drive a passenger car

name: Volga River Bank
description: A very beautiful wild parking place with a tent or a motorhome, you can drive a 2*2 passenger car

name: Lake shore
description: A beautiful parking place with a tent or a motorhome on the lake shore

name: Near station
description: Clean tap water.  water pressure is good

name: City center
description: Clean tap water. Water pressure is good. There is a KFC .

name: Ekaterimburgo
description: Parking is for campers and big rigs amongst out-of-town buses. Bus drivers had no issue with us parking here (big rig). Next to lake and Kosmos Theater. No fees. Parking for one or two. But very noisy over the weekend

name: Riverside wild camp
description: Beautiful spot not far from the road. Calm and quiet just next to the river. Ok for big rigs !

name: European Bison Farm
description: You can visit and look at their bison (they're massive!) and some elk as well. Entrance 300r pp. The lady there was very nice and tried to explain a lot about the animals but only in Russian. She gave us some carrots to feed to them.

name: Awesome view on the Volga
description: Nearly abandoned village with most spectacular view of the Volga river. Sleeping on the bank of the river. 4wd needed when it rains as the tracks could be slippery. Good 4G signal. No trFfic except some locals and barges on the river.

name: Enfrente de un lago
description: you enter through a forest, the road is dirt with potholes. with rain traveling this road is complicated. we were 3 meters tall and had no problem. the place is very nice and quiet. There are several parking spaces (you need to level the camper) without services. place in nature. there is only in the morning some fisherman. there is a Megafon and mts network

name: SIM card from multiple networks
description: At this comercial center you can buy SIM cards from Beeline, Megafon, MTC. They are all next to each other,  you just need to find it. Open in Sundays

name: Tap water next the mosque at the petrol station
description: Here you have 5 taps where you can fill up water. One of the taps has great very good presure. Side note, this petrol station had the best diesel price of all the petrol stations in this town (when we passed by)

name: Directly on the bank of the Volga river
description: Perfect spot to stay for a couple of nights. No road traffic except for trucks sparking at rest stop. But there is so much space you could move at least 500m either way from it. Accessible for all vehicles. Two entrances either side of the parking lot. Shade further back with plenty of trees.

name: glass repair shop and garage
description:
Big building full of different kind of repair shops. We went to fix a crack in our windshield. It has a high enough entrance to fit our car (2,5 meters). Super nice people. We payed 1400 rubles to repair the crack and it was done in 30 minutes.

The picture with the yellow signs is the front of the building. Drive in at the right side, there you will see blue doors. In there is the garage.

name: Hidden forest camp
description: Campsite that seems to be used by locals (with little fireplace and trash) off the main road with lots of flat ground. You can hear the traffic and trains at night, but the site is very hidden and surrounded by many trees. Take the side street off the main road and turn right at the wooden sign, it's about 200m on a forestry trail that was easy to drive on when we were there. No access to water, no signal on Beeline, quite a few ticks. Good for a night, considering lots of places around here are very muddy.

name: Burevestnik camping
description: Camping next to the Ekroplan. We arrived at night, didn't know there was a camping here. The asking price for one night (October, mid-week) was 800 rubles (approx. 8 euro). We offered 500 rubles and they guy agreed. He needed our phone number and car number and we were checked in. There are showers with hot water & good pressure, toilets, you can connect to electricity and to water. The place is next to the sea but it looks really basic. There was only one other camper when we were here. Quiet and very cheap.

name: beautiful zoopark
description: really recommendable park with a huge amount of animals. It's very clean and you can also learn a lot of fauna in Russia.

name: Saratov
description: Washing and drying, 2 machines for 730 Rubel

name: Water Cafe
description: water in front of a cafe on the right side of the road in direction from  Grosny to Astrachan

name: Baikal beachfront
description: This is a place by the Baikal lake. You can stay there and spend the night. You can swim in the lake. BBQ and fire allowed. Simply the best!

name: Ferry to mushroom stones and holy water
description: At this place you can take the "ferry" to cross the river. Over there is the start to walk to the mushroom stones or to the well of holy water. Drive to the river and honk or make some noise to call the ferry!

name: mechanic Andrei
description: tires and mechanic. If you need your tires pressured up after the bad road in the Ak-Tash valley.

name: swans pond
description: On an open field at a lake/pond with lot of swans on it. A camp nearby, but closed at this time of the year. 4G slow. All alone with the swans and good distance to the road.

name: MAN garage in Novossibirsk
description: MAN garage in Novossibirsk. If you drive a Man this location might be more than useful.

name: On the grass out of sight
description:
We found this spot via Google Maps and had a quiet afternoon/night. It‚Äôs a grassy field located in a valley that was cut out by the river. If you walk further down you can acces this river. You are not visible from the road, only by some buildings in the far distance. 

It‚Äôs close to the town of Chasavjoert, so you only have to drive a short section of non ‚Äòmain road‚Äô and we didn‚Äôt see a checkpoints here. From the tarmac there‚Äôs a small track leading down, the first field has some trash but it gets better when you get lower and reach this spot. Would work for tents as well. LTE with MTS.

name: Caf√©-restaurant
description: Little place with simple food. I put my tent behind it for the night

name: Gostinitsa Mekegi
description: The reception is in the market next to it. Quite clean and building in good condition. 200 (20‚Ç¨) for single bed with shared bathroom and 300 for double bed with private bathroom

name: METRO hypermarket
description:
Very very big supermarkted. It has almost everything. Its directly next to the road from Georgia to Vladikavkaz. It has a big parking area so accessible for all vehicles. Good place to spend your left over Russian money when going to Georgia. 
It feels like an European supermarket which was nice after Central Asia.

name: Stanislavskij Hostel
description: Amazing hostel, very clean, big beds, free laundry and cyclist friendly. I paid 750 rouble (7.5‚Ç¨) per night

name: FITSERVICE
description: FITSERVICE is a chain of mechanical car workshops all over this area. They fix all brands of cars. Good equipped.

name: at the Baikal
description: There are a lot of nice places to stay, directly at the lake, Baikal! It says swimming vorbiden. G3. Maximum hight 3 meters.

name: Alexander Masasin mechanic
description: As explained at the old place. Top mechanic! That's the new place. In wintertime heatet garage. He still works on Land Rover. See him on Facebook.

name: bush camp at the river
description: Nice camp at the river Irkut. Bush protected. Flat and easy access.  4G. Swimming, fishing, walking. Near town and shoping.

name: Alpha insurance
description:
30 days car insurance for 4.937 rub.
very friendly staff, English speaking.

name: Police checkpoint (avoid if possible)
description:
We were stopped at a checkpoint here. You can see it on street view, so it is there permanently - not just a random check. We couldn‚Äôt really communicate, but managed to do a little with Google Translate. They gave us a fine for something, we don‚Äôt really now what. Something about a document we didn‚Äôt have. They gave us a real-looking fine (2000 rub / ‚Ç¨20 per person) and we were not allowed to pay it on the spot, which tells me it might have been a real fine, not just someone looking for easy money. We were told to pay it in the bank or on the border. We drove to the border the morning after and nobody mentioned anything, so we didn‚Äôt either and never paid anything.

In the end nothing happened, but it was pretty uncomfortable. They weren‚Äôt friendly and they all had AK-47‚Äôs on their backs. One young guy was drinking vodka and was drunk. They clearly called their friends further down the road, because we were stopped twice on the same road after we left and immediately asked to show the fine we just got.

If you can, take the main road instead of this one.

name: Great Caucasian food. Lots of vegetables!
description: We had been driving 7000 km from Ulan Ude to Georgia and this was just what we needed. Easily the best food we had during our time in Russia. Lots of fresh vegetables and delicious caucasian dishes. Restaurant is called Dendrarium.

name: Simple, clean, gated hotel
description: Great to spend a night on the way to or from the border. Simple, but clean and inexpensive. We paid 2800 rub (‚Ç¨30) for a night. Hotel and parking is fully gated.

name: Abatskoje Motel with outside socket
description: It's a truck stop, I politely asked for electricity and was able to charge my battery on outside Socket for a small tip overnight and could sleep in my cabin.

name: good for 1 Night
description: It's a big parking lot and it's not too loud.

name: Near Gagarin landig
description: Out in the bush between Gagarin landing and capsule landing memorials. You can hear the traffic. At night not to bat. Hidden from the road. 4G. Flat areas.

name: green place for the night
description: hidden place between earth wall and a little creek. there are also some trees, a lot of space , you can hear the road but it's ok I think for a quick night. road was a little muddy
